51  void deactivate(int index, zHEData type)
52  {
53  // Vertex
54  if (type == zVertexData)
55  {
56  if (index > meshObj->mesh.vertexActive.size()) throw std::invalid_argument(" error: index out of bounds.");
57  if (!meshObj->mesh.vertexActive[index]) throw std::invalid_argument(" error: index out of bounds.");
58 
59  // remove from vertexPosition map
60  meshObj->mesh.removeFromPositionMap(meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[index]);
61 
62  // null pointers indexed vertex
63  meshObj->mesh.vertices[index].removeVertex();
64 
65  // disable indexed vertex
66 
67  meshObj->mesh.vertexActive[index] = false;
68 
69  meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[index] = zVector(10000, 10000, 10000); // dummy position for VBO
70  meshObj->mesh.vertexNormals[index] = zVector(0, 0, 1); // dummy normal for VBO
71  meshObj->mesh.vertexColors[index] = zColor(1, 1, 1, 1); // dummy color for VBO
72 
73 
74  // update numVertices
75  int newNumVertices = numVertices() - 1;
76  meshObj->mesh.setNumVertices(newNumVertices, false);
77  }
78 
79  // Edge
80  else if (type == zEdgeData)
81  {
82 
83  if (index > meshObj->mesh.edgeActive.size()) throw std::invalid_argument(" error: index out of bounds.");
84  if (!meshObj->mesh.edgeActive[index]) throw std::invalid_argument(" error: index out of bounds.");
85 
86  int symEdge = meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getSym()->getEdgeId();
87 
88  // check if the vertex attached to the edge has the pointer to the current edge. If true update the pointer.
89  int v1 = meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getVertex()->getVertexId();
90  int v2 = meshObj->mesh.edges[symEdge].getVertex()->getVertexId();
91 
92 
93  if (meshObj->mesh.vertices[v1].getEdge()->getEdgeId() == symEdge)
94  {
95  vector<int> cEdgesV1;
96  getConnectedEdges(v1, zVertexData, cEdgesV1);
97 
98  for (int i = 0; i < cEdgesV1.size(); i++)
99  {
100  if (cEdgesV1[i] != symEdge) meshObj->mesh.vertices[v1].setEdge(&meshObj->mesh.edges[cEdgesV1[i]]);
101  }
102  }
103 
104  if (meshObj->mesh.vertices[v2].getEdge()->getEdgeId() == index)
105  {
106  vector<int> cEdgesV2;
107  getConnectedEdges(v2, zVertexData, cEdgesV2);
108 
109  for (int i = 0; i < cEdgesV2.size(); i++)
110  {
111  if (cEdgesV2[i] != index) meshObj->mesh.vertices[v2].setEdge(&meshObj->mesh.edges[cEdgesV2[i]]);
112  }
113  }
114 
115  // check if the face attached to the edge has the pointer to the current edge. if true update pointer.
116 
117  if (meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getFace())
118  {
119 
120  if (meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getFace()->getEdge()->getEdgeId() == index)
121  {
122  vector<int> cEdgesV1;
123  getConnectedEdges(v1, zVertexData, cEdgesV1);
124 
125  for (int i = 0; i < cEdgesV1.size(); i++)
126  {
127  if (meshObj->mesh.edges[cEdgesV1[i]].getFace() == meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getFace()) meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getFace()->setEdge(&meshObj->mesh.edges[cEdgesV1[i]]);
128  }
129 
130  }
131 
132  }
133 
134  if (meshObj->mesh.edges[symEdge].getFace())
135  {
136  if (meshObj->mesh.edges[symEdge].getFace()->getEdge()->getEdgeId() == symEdge)
137  {
138  vector<int> cEdgesV2;
139  getConnectedEdges(v2, zVertexData, cEdgesV2);
140 
141  for (int i = 0; i < cEdgesV2.size(); i++)
142  {
143  if (meshObj->mesh.edges[cEdgesV2[i]].getFace() == meshObj->mesh.edges[symEdge].getFace()) meshObj->mesh.edges[symEdge].getFace()->setEdge(&meshObj->mesh.edges[cEdgesV2[i]]);
144  }
145 
146  }
147 
148  }
149 
150  // remove edge from vertex edge map
151  meshObj->mesh.removeFromVerticesEdge(v1, v2);
152 
153  // make current edge pointer null
154  meshObj->mesh.edges[index].removeEdge();
155  meshObj->mesh.edges[symEdge].removeEdge();
156 
157  // deactivate edges
158  meshObj->mesh.edgeActive[index] = false;
159  meshObj->mesh.edgeActive[symEdge] = false;
160 
161  // update numEdges
162  int newNumEdges = numEdges() - 2;
163  meshObj->mesh.setNumEdges(newNumEdges, false);
164  }
165 
166  // Face
167  else if (type == zFaceData)
168  {
169  if (index > meshObj->mesh.faceActive.size()) throw std::invalid_argument(" error: index out of bounds.");
170  if (!meshObj->mesh.faceActive[index]) throw std::invalid_argument(" error: index out of bounds.");
171 
172 
173  // make current face pointers null
174  meshObj->mesh.faces[index].removeFace();;
175 
176  // deactivate face
177  meshObj->mesh.faceActive[index] = false;
178 
179  // update numPolygons
180  int newNumFaces = numPolygons() - 1;
181  meshObj->mesh.setNumPolygons(newNumFaces, false);
182  }
183 
184  else throw std::invalid_argument(" error: invalid zHEData type");
185 
186  }

193  void removeInactive(zHEData type = zVertexData)
194  {
195  // Vertex
196  if (type == zVertexData)
197  {
198 
199  if (meshObj->mesh.vertexActive.size() != numVertices())
200  {
201  zVertex *resized = new zVertex[meshObj->mesh.max_n_v];
202 
203  int vertexActiveID = 0;
204  int numOrginalVertexActive = meshObj->mesh.vertexActive.size();
205 
206  for (int i = 0; i < numVertices(); i++)
207  {
208 
209  while (!meshObj->mesh.vertexActive[i])
210  {
211  meshObj->mesh.vertexActive.erase(meshObj->mesh.vertexActive.begin() + i);
212 
213  meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions.erase(meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions.begin() + i);
214 
215  meshObj->mesh.vertexColors.erase(meshObj->mesh.vertexColors.begin() + i);
216 
217  meshObj->mesh.vertexNormals.erase(meshObj->mesh.vertexNormals.begin() + i);
218 
219  vertexActiveID++;
220 
221  }
222 
223  resized[i].setVertexId(i);
224 
225 
226  // get connected edges and repoint their pointers
227  if (vertexActiveID < numOrginalVertexActive)
228  {
229  vector<int> cEdges;
230  getConnectedEdges(vertexActiveID, zVertexData, cEdges);
231 
232  for (int j = 0; j < cEdges.size(); j++)
233  {
234  meshObj->mesh.edges[cEdges[j]].getSym()->setVertex(&resized[i]);
235  }
236 
237 
238  if (meshObj->mesh.vertices[vertexActiveID].getEdge())
239  {
240  resized[i].setEdge(&meshObj->mesh.edges[meshObj->mesh.vertices[vertexActiveID].getEdge()->getEdgeId()]);
241 
242  meshObj->mesh.edges[meshObj->mesh.vertices[vertexActiveID].getEdge()->getEdgeId()].getSym()->setVertex(&resized[i]);
243  }
244  }
245 
246 
247  vertexActiveID++;
248 
249  }
250 
251  //printf("\n m: %i %i ", numVertices(), vertexActive.size());
252 
253 
254  delete[] meshObj->mesh.vertices;
255 
256  meshObj->mesh.vertices = resized;
257 
258  //printf("\n removed inactive vertices. ");
259  }
260 
261  }
262 
263  // Edge
264  else if (type == zEdgeData)
265  {
266  if (meshObj->mesh.edgeActive.size() != numEdges())
267  {
268  zEdge *resized = new zEdge[meshObj->mesh.max_n_e];
269 
270  int edgeActiveID = 0;
271  int numOrginalEdgeActive = meshObj->mesh.edgeActive.size();
272 
273  int inactiveCounter = 0;
274 
275  // clear vertices edge map
276  meshObj->mesh.verticesEdge.clear();
277 
278 
279  for (int i = 0; i < numEdges(); i += 2)
280  {
281 
282  while (!meshObj->mesh.edgeActive[i])
283  {
284  meshObj->mesh.edgeActive.erase(meshObj->mesh.edgeActive.begin() + i);
285 
286  meshObj->mesh.edgeColors.erase(meshObj->mesh.edgeColors.begin() + i);
287 
288  edgeActiveID++;
289 
290  }
291 
292 
293  resized[i].setEdgeId(i);
294  resized[i + 1].setEdgeId(i + 1);
295 
296  // get connected edges and repoint their pointers
297  if (edgeActiveID < numOrginalEdgeActive)
298  {
299 
300 
301  resized[i].setSym(&resized[i + 1]);
302 
303  if (meshObj->mesh.edges[edgeActiveID].getNext())
304  {
305  resized[i].setNext(&resized[meshObj->mesh.edges[edgeActiveID].getNext()->getEdgeId()]);
306 
307  meshObj->mesh.edges[edgeActiveID].getNext()->setPrev(&resized[i]);
308  }
309  if (meshObj->mesh.edges[edgeActiveID].getPrev())
310  {
311  resized[i].setPrev(&resized[meshObj->mesh.edges[edgeActiveID].getPrev()->getEdgeId()]);
312 
313  meshObj->mesh.edges[edgeActiveID].getPrev()->setNext(&resized[i]);
314  }
315 
316 
317  if (meshObj->mesh.edges[edgeActiveID].getVertex())
318  {
319  resized[i].setVertex(&meshObj->mesh.vertices[meshObj->mesh.edges[edgeActiveID].getVertex()->getVertexId()]);
320 
321  meshObj->mesh.vertices[meshObj->mesh.edges[edgeActiveID].getVertex()->getVertexId()].setEdge(resized[i].getSym());
322  }
323 
324  if (meshObj->mesh.edges[edgeActiveID].getFace())
325  {
326  resized[i].setFace(&meshObj->mesh.faces[meshObj->mesh.edges[edgeActiveID].getFace()->getFaceId()]);
327  meshObj->mesh.faces[meshObj->mesh.edges[edgeActiveID].getFace()->getFaceId()].setEdge(&resized[i]);
328  }
329 
330 
331 
332  //sym edge
333  if (meshObj->mesh.edges[edgeActiveID + 1].getNext())
334  {
335  resized[i + 1].setNext(&resized[meshObj->mesh.edges[edgeActiveID + 1].getNext()->getEdgeId()]);
336 
337  meshObj->mesh.edges[edgeActiveID + 1].getNext()->setPrev(&resized[i + 1]);
338 
339  }
340  if (meshObj->mesh.edges[edgeActiveID + 1].getPrev())
341  {
342  resized[i + 1].setPrev(&resized[meshObj->mesh.edges[edgeActiveID + 1].getPrev()->getEdgeId()]);
343 
344  meshObj->mesh.edges[edgeActiveID + 1].getPrev()->setNext(&resized[i + 1]);
345  }
346 
347  if (meshObj->mesh.edges[edgeActiveID + 1].getVertex())
348  {
349  resized[i + 1].setVertex(&meshObj->mesh.vertices[meshObj->mesh.edges[edgeActiveID + 1].getVertex()->getVertexId()]);
350  meshObj->mesh.vertices[meshObj->mesh.edges[edgeActiveID + 1].getVertex()->getVertexId()].setEdge(resized[i + 1].getSym());
351  }
352 
353  if (meshObj->mesh.edges[edgeActiveID + 1].getFace())
354  {
355  resized[i + 1].setFace(&meshObj->mesh.faces[meshObj->mesh.edges[edgeActiveID + 1].getFace()->getFaceId()]);
356  meshObj->mesh.faces[meshObj->mesh.edges[edgeActiveID + 1].getFace()->getFaceId()].setEdge(&resized[i + 1]);
357  }
358 
359 
360  // rebuild vertices edge map
361  int v2 = resized[i].getVertex()->getVertexId();
362  int v1 = resized[i + 1].getVertex()->getVertexId();
363 
364  meshObj->mesh.addToVerticesEdge(v1, v2, i);
365 
366  }
367 
368  edgeActiveID += 2;
369 
370  }
371 
372  //printf("\n m: %i %i ", numEdges(), edgeActive.size());
373 
374  for (int i = 0; i < meshObj->mesh.vertexActive.size(); i++)
375  {
376  if (meshObj->mesh.vertices[i].getEdge()) meshObj->mesh.vertices[i].setEdge(&resized[meshObj->mesh.vertices[i].getEdge()->getEdgeId()]);
377  }
378 
379  for (int i = 0; i < meshObj->mesh.faceActive.size(); i++)
380  {
381  if (meshObj->mesh.faces[i].getEdge()) meshObj->mesh.faces[i].setEdge(&resized[meshObj->mesh.faces[i].getEdge()->getEdgeId()]);
382 
383  }
384 
385  delete[] meshObj->mesh.edges;
386  meshObj->mesh.edges = resized;
387 
388  //printf("\n removed inactive edges. ");
389  }
390 
391 
392 
393  }
394 
395  // Mesh Face
396  else if (type == zFaceData)
397  {
398  if (meshObj->mesh.faceActive.size() != numPolygons())
399  {
400  zFace *resized = new zFace[meshObj->mesh.max_n_f];
401 
402  int faceActiveID = 0;
403  int numOrginalFaceActive = meshObj->mesh.faceActive.size();
404

406  {

468  void toOBJ(string outfilename)
469  {
470 
471  // remove inactive elements
472  if (numVertices() != meshObj->mesh.vertexActive.size()) removeInactiveElements(zVertexData);
473  if (numEdges() != meshObj->mesh.edgeActive.size()) removeInactiveElements(zEdgeData);
474  if (numPolygons() != meshObj->mesh.faceActive.size()) removeInactiveElements(zFaceData);
475 
476  // output file
477  ofstream myfile;
478  myfile.open(outfilename.c_str());
479 
480  if (myfile.fail())
481  {
482  cout << " error in opening file " << outfilename.c_str() << endl;
483  return;
484 
485  }
486 
487 
488 
489  // vertex positions
490  for (int i = 0; i < meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions.size(); i++)
491  {
492  myfile << "\n v " << meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[i].x << " " << meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[i].y << " " << meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[i].z;
493 
494  }
495 
496  // vertex nornmals
497  for (int i = 0; i < meshObj->mesh.vertexNormals.size(); i++)
498  {
499  myfile << "\n vn " << meshObj->mesh.vertexNormals[i].x << " " << meshObj->mesh.vertexNormals[i].y << " " << meshObj->mesh.vertexNormals[i].z;
500 
501  }
502 
503  myfile << "\n";
504 
505  // face connectivity
506  for (int i = 0; i < numPolygons(); i++)
507  {
508  vector<int> fVerts;
509  getVertices(i, zFaceData, fVerts);
510 
511  myfile << "\n f ";
512 
513  for (int j = 0; j < fVerts.size(); j++)
514  {
515  myfile << fVerts[j] + 1;
516 
517  if (j != fVerts.size() - 1) myfile << " ";
518  }
519 
520  }
521 
522 
523 
524 
525  myfile.close();
526 
527  cout << endl << " OBJ exported. File: " << outfilename.c_str() << endl;
528 
529  }

537  void toJSON(string outfilename)
538  {
539 
540  // remove inactive elements
541  if (numVertices() != meshObj->mesh.vertexActive.size()) removeInactiveElements(zVertexData);
542  if (numEdges() != meshObj->mesh.edgeActive.size()) removeInactiveElements(zEdgeData);
543  if (numPolygons() != meshObj->mesh.faceActive.size())removeInactiveElements(zFaceData);
544 
545  // CREATE JSON FILE
546  zUtilsJsonHE meshJSON;
547  json j;
548 
549  // Vertices
550  for (int i = 0; i < numVertices(); i++)
551  {
552  if (meshObj->mesh.vertices[i].getEdge()) meshJSON.vertices.push_back(meshObj->mesh.vertices[i].getEdge()->getEdgeId());
553  else meshJSON.vertices.push_back(-1);
554 
555  }
556 
557  //Edges
558  for (int i = 0; i < numEdges(); i++)
559  {
560  vector<int> HE_edges;
561 
562  if (meshObj->mesh.edges[i].getPrev()) HE_edges.push_back(meshObj->mesh.edges[i].getPrev()->getEdgeId());
563  else HE_edges.push_back(-1);
564 
565  if (meshObj->mesh.edges[i].getNext()) HE_edges.push_back(meshObj->mesh.edges[i].getNext()->getEdgeId());
566  else HE_edges.push_back(-1);
567 
568  if (meshObj->mesh.edges[i].getVertex()) HE_edges.push_back(meshObj->mesh.edges[i].getVertex()->getVertexId());
569  else HE_edges.push_back(-1);
570 
571  if (meshObj->mesh.edges[i].getFace()) HE_edges.push_back(meshObj->mesh.edges[i].getFace()->getFaceId());
572  else HE_edges.push_back(-1);
573 
574  meshJSON.halfedges.push_back(HE_edges);
575  }
576 
577  // Faces
578  for (int i = 0; i < numPolygons(); i++)
579  {
580  if (meshObj->mesh.faces[i].getEdge()) meshJSON.faces.push_back(meshObj->mesh.faces[i].getEdge()->getEdgeId());
581  else meshJSON.faces.push_back(-1);
582  }
583 
584  // vertex Attributes
585  for (int i = 0; i < meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions.size(); i++)
586  {
587  vector<double> v_attrib;
588 
589  v_attrib.push_back(meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[i].x);
590  v_attrib.push_back(meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[i].y);
591  v_attrib.push_back(meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[i].z);
592 
593  v_attrib.push_back(meshObj->mesh.vertexNormals[i].x);
594  v_attrib.push_back(meshObj->mesh.vertexNormals[i].y);
595  v_attrib.push_back(meshObj->mesh.vertexNormals[i].z);
596 
597 
598  v_attrib.push_back(meshObj->mesh.vertexColors[i].r);
599  v_attrib.push_back(meshObj->mesh.vertexColors[i].g);
600  v_attrib.push_back(meshObj->mesh.vertexColors[i].b);
601 
602 
603  meshJSON.vertexAttributes.push_back(v_attrib);
604  }
605 
606  // face Attributes
607  for (int i = 0; i < numPolygons(); i++)
608  {
609  vector<double> f_attrib;
610 
611  f_attrib.push_back(meshObj->mesh.faceNormals[i].x);
612  f_attrib.push_back(meshObj->mesh.faceNormals[i].y);
613  f_attrib.push_back(meshObj->mesh.faceNormals[i].z);
614 
615  f_attrib.push_back(meshObj->mesh.faceColors[i].r);
616  f_attrib.push_back(meshObj->mesh.faceColors[i].g);
617  f_attrib.push_back(meshObj->mesh.faceColors[i].b);
618 
619  meshJSON.faceAttributes.push_back(f_attrib);
620  }
621 
622 
623 
624  // Json file
625  j["Vertices"] = meshJSON.vertices;
626  j["Halfedges"] = meshJSON.halfedges;
627  j["Faces"] = meshJSON.faces;
628  j["VertexAttributes"] = meshJSON.vertexAttributes;
629  j["HalfedgeAttributes"] = meshJSON.halfedgeAttributes;
630  j["FaceAttributes"] = meshJSON.faceAttributes;
631 
632  // EXPORT
633 
634  ofstream myfile;
635  myfile.open(outfilename.c_str());
636 
637  if (myfile.fail())
638  {
639  cout << " error in opening file " << outfilename.c_str() << endl;
640  return;
641  }
642 
643  //myfile.precision(16);
644  myfile << j.dump();
645  myfile.close();
646 
647  }

654  void fromOBJ(string infilename)
655  {
656  vector<zVector>positions;
657  vector<int>polyConnects;
658  vector<int>polyCounts;
659 
660  vector<zVector> vertexNormals;
661  vector<zVector> faceNormals;
662 
663  ifstream myfile;
664  myfile.open(infilename.c_str());
665 
666  if (myfile.fail())
667  {
668  cout << " error in opening file " << infilename.c_str() << endl;
669  return;
670 
671  }
672 
673  while (!myfile.eof())
674  {
675  string str;
676  getline(myfile, str);
677 
678  vector<string> perlineData = meshObj->mesh.coreUtils.splitString(str, " ");
679 
680  if (perlineData.size() > 0)
681  {
682  // vertex
683  if (perlineData[0] == "v")
684  {
685  if (perlineData.size() == 4)
686  {
687  zVector pos;
688  pos.x = atof(perlineData[1].c_str());
689  pos.y = atof(perlineData[2].c_str());
690  pos.z = atof(perlineData[3].c_str());
691 
692  positions.push_back(pos);
693  }
694  //printf("\n working vertex");
695  }
696 
697  // vertex normal
698  if (perlineData[0] == "vn")
699  {
700  //printf("\n working vertex normal ");
701  if (perlineData.size() == 4)
702  {
703  zVector norm;
704  norm.x = atof(perlineData[1].c_str());
705  norm.y = atof(perlineData[2].c_str());
706  norm.z = atof(perlineData[3].c_str());
707 
708  vertexNormals.push_back(norm);
709  }
710  //printf("\n working vertex");
711  }
712 
713  // face
714  if (perlineData[0] == "f")
715  {
716 
717  zVector norm;
718 
719 
720 
721  for (int i = 1; i < perlineData.size(); i++)
722  {
723  vector<string> faceData = meshObj->mesh.coreUtils.splitString(perlineData[i], "/");
724 
725  //vector<string> cleanFaceData = splitString(faceData[0], "/\/");
726 
727  int id = atoi(faceData[0].c_str()) - 1;
728  polyConnects.push_back(id);
729 
730  //printf(" %i ", id);
731 
732  int normId = atoi(faceData[faceData.size() - 1].c_str()) - 1;
733  norm += vertexNormals[normId];
734 
735  }
736 
737  norm /= (perlineData.size() - 1);
738  norm.normalize();
739  faceNormals.push_back(norm);
740 
741  polyCounts.push_back(perlineData.size() - 1);
742  //printf("\n working face ");
743  }
744  }
745  }
746 
747  myfile.close();
748 
749 
750  meshObj->mesh = zMesh(positions, polyCounts, polyConnects);;
751  printf("\n mesh: %i %i %i", numVertices(), numEdges(), numPolygons());
752 
753 
754  setFaceNormals(faceNormals);
755 
756  }
757 
765  void fromJSON(string infilename)
766  {
767  json j;
768  zUtilsJsonHE meshJSON;
769 
770 
771  ifstream in_myfile;
772  in_myfile.open(infilename.c_str());
773 
774  int lineCnt = 0;
775 
776  if (in_myfile.fail())
777  {
778  cout << " error in opening file " << infilename.c_str() << endl;
779  return;
780  }
781 
782  in_myfile >> j;
783  in_myfile.close();
784 
785  // READ Data from JSON
786 
787  // Vertices
788  meshJSON.vertices.clear();
789  meshJSON.vertices = (j["Vertices"].get<vector<int>>());
790 
791  //Edges
792  meshJSON.halfedges.clear();
793  meshJSON.halfedges = (j["Halfedges"].get<vector<vector<int>>>());
794 
795  // Faces
796  meshJSON.faces.clear();
797  meshJSON.faces = (j["Faces"].get<vector<int>>());
798 
799 
800  // update mesh
801 
802  meshObj->mesh.vertices = new zVertex[meshJSON.vertices.size() * 2];
803  meshObj->mesh.edges = new zEdge[meshJSON.halfedges.size() * 2];
804  meshObj->mesh.faces = new zFace[meshJSON.faces.size() * 2];
805 
806  meshObj->mesh.setNumVertices(meshJSON.vertices.size());
807  meshObj->mesh.setNumEdges(floor(meshJSON.halfedges.size()));
808  meshObj->mesh.setNumPolygons(meshJSON.faces.size());
809 
810  meshObj->mesh.vertexActive.clear();
811  for (int i = 0; i < meshJSON.vertices.size(); i++)
812  {
813  meshObj->mesh.vertices[i].setVertexId(i);
814  if (meshJSON.vertices[i] != -1) meshObj->mesh.vertices[i].setEdge(&meshObj->mesh.edges[meshJSON.vertices[i]]);
815 
816  meshObj->mesh.vertexActive.push_back(true);
817  }
818 
819  int k = 0;
820  meshObj->mesh.edgeActive.clear();
821  for (int i = 0; i < meshJSON.halfedges.size(); i++)
822  {
823  meshObj->mesh.edges[i].setEdgeId(i);
824 
825  if (meshJSON.halfedges[i][k] != -1) meshObj->mesh.edges[i].setPrev(&meshObj->mesh.edges[meshJSON.halfedges[i][k]]);
826  if (meshJSON.halfedges[i][k + 1] != -1) meshObj->mesh.edges[i].setNext(&meshObj->mesh.edges[meshJSON.halfedges[i][k + 1]]);
827  if (meshJSON.halfedges[i][k + 2] != -1) meshObj->mesh.edges[i].setVertex(&meshObj->mesh.vertices[meshJSON.halfedges[i][k + 2]]);
828  if (meshJSON.halfedges[i][k + 3] != -1) meshObj->mesh.edges[i].setFace(&meshObj->mesh.faces[meshJSON.halfedges[i][k + 3]]);
829 
830 
831  if (i % 2 == 0) meshObj->mesh.edges[i].setSym(&meshObj->mesh.edges[i]);
832  else meshObj->mesh.edges[i].setSym(&meshObj->mesh.edges[i - 1]);
833 
834  meshObj->mesh.edgeActive.push_back(true);
835  }
836 
837  meshObj->mesh.faceActive.clear();
838  for (int i = 0; i < meshJSON.faces.size(); i++)
839  {
840  meshObj->mesh.faces[i].setFaceId(i);
841  if (meshJSON.faces[i] != -1) meshObj->mesh.faces[i].setEdge(&meshObj->mesh.edges[meshJSON.faces[i]]);
842 
843  meshObj->mesh.faceActive.push_back(true);
844  }
845 
846  // Vertex Attributes
847  meshJSON.vertexAttributes = j["VertexAttributes"].get<vector<vector<double>>>();
848  //printf("\n vertexAttributes: %zi %zi", vertexAttributes.size(), vertexAttributes[0].size());
849 
850  meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions.clear();
851  for (int i = 0; i < meshJSON.vertexAttributes.size(); i++)
852  {
853  for (int k = 0; k < meshJSON.vertexAttributes[i].size(); k++)
854  {
855 
856  // position and color
857 
858  if (meshJSON.vertexAttributes[i].size() == 9)
859  {
860  zVector pos(meshJSON.vertexAttributes[i][k], meshJSON.vertexAttributes[i][k + 1], meshJSON.vertexAttributes[i][k + 2]);
861  meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions.push_back(pos);
862 
863  zVector normal(meshJSON.vertexAttributes[i][k + 3], meshJSON.vertexAttributes[i][k + 4], meshJSON.vertexAttributes[i][k + 5]);
864  meshObj->mesh.vertexNormals.push_back(pos);
865 
866  zColor col(meshJSON.vertexAttributes[i][k + 6], meshJSON.vertexAttributes[i][k + 7], meshJSON.vertexAttributes[i][k + 8], 1);
867  meshObj->mesh.vertexColors.push_back(col);
868 
869  k += 8;
870  }
871  }
872  }
873 
874 
875  // Edge Attributes
876  meshJSON.halfedgeAttributes = j["HalfedgeAttributes"].get<vector<vector<double>>>();
877 
878 
879  // face Attributes
880  meshJSON.faceAttributes = j["FaceAttributes"].get<vector<vector<double>>>();
881 
882  meshObj->mesh.faceColors.clear();
883  meshObj->mesh.faceNormals.clear();
884  for (int i = 0; i < meshJSON.faceAttributes.size(); i++)
885  {
886  for (int k = 0; k < meshJSON.faceAttributes[i].size(); k++)
887  {
888  // position
889  if (meshJSON.faceAttributes[i].size() == 6)
890  {
891  zColor col(meshJSON.faceAttributes[i][k + 3], meshJSON.faceAttributes[i][k + 4], meshJSON.faceAttributes[i][k + 5], 1);
892  meshObj->mesh.faceColors.push_back(col);
893 
894 
895  zVector normal(meshJSON.faceAttributes[i][k], meshJSON.faceAttributes[i][k + 1], meshJSON.faceAttributes[i][k + 2]);
896  meshObj->mesh.faceNormals.push_back(normal);
897 
898  k += 5;
899  }
900  }
901 
902  }
903 
904 
905  // add to maps
906  for (int i = 0; i < meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions.size(); i++)
907  {
908  meshObj->mesh.addToPositionMap(meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[i], i);
909  }
910 
911 
912  for (int i = 0; i < numEdges(); i += 2)
913  {
914  int v1 = meshObj->mesh.edges[i].getVertex()->getVertexId();
915  int v2 = meshObj->mesh.edges[i + 1].getVertex()->getVertexId();
916 
917  meshObj->mesh.addToVerticesEdge(v1, v2, i);
918  }
919 
920  }

1083  bool vertexExists(zVector pos, int &outVertexId)
1084  {
1085  bool out = false;;
1086 
1087  double factor = pow(10, 3);
1088  double x = round(pos.x *factor) / factor;
1089  double y = round(pos.y *factor) / factor;
1090  double z = round(pos.z *factor) / factor;
1091 
1092  string hashKey = (to_string(x) + "," + to_string(y) + "," + to_string(z));
1093  std::unordered_map<std::string, int>::const_iterator got = meshObj->mesh.positionVertex.find(hashKey);
1094 
1095 
1096  if (got != meshObj->mesh.positionVertex.end())
1097  {
1098  out = true;
1099  outVertexId = got->second;
1100  }
1101 
1102 
1103  return out;
1104  }

1114  bool edgeExists(int v1, int v2, int &outEdgeId)
1115  {
1116 
1117  bool out = false;
1118 
1119  string hashKey = (to_string(v1) + "," + to_string(v2));
1120  std::unordered_map<std::string, int>::const_iterator got = meshObj->mesh.verticesEdge.find(hashKey);
1121 
1122 
1123  if (got != meshObj->mesh.verticesEdge.end())
1124  {
1125  out = true;
1126  outEdgeId = got->second;
1127  }
1128 
1129  return out;

1139  void getEdges(int index, zHEData type, vector<int> &edgeIndicies)
1140  {
1141  vector<int> out;
1142  out.clear();
1143 
1144  // Mesh Face
1145  if (type == zFaceData)
1146  {
1147  if (meshObj->mesh.faces[index].getEdge())
1148  {
1149  zEdge* start = meshObj->mesh.faces[index].getEdge();
1150  zEdge* e = start;
1151 
1152  bool exit = false;
1153 
1154  do
1155  {
1156  out.push_back(e->getEdgeId());
1157  if (e->getNext())e = e->getNext();
1158  else exit = true;
1159 
1160  } while (e != start && !exit);
1161  }
1162  }
1163 
1164  else throw std::invalid_argument(" error: invalid zHEData type");
1165 
1166  edgeIndicies = out;
1167  }

1186 
1187

1189  else if (type == zFaceData)
1190  {
1191

1198  out.push_back(meshObj->mesh.edges[faceEdges[i]].getSym()->getVertex()->getVertexId());
1199  }
1200  }
1201 
1202  else throw std::invalid_argument(" error: invalid zHEData type");
1203 
1204  vertexIndicies = out;
1205  }

1260  void getConnectedEdges(int index, zHEData type, vector<int>& edgeIndicies)
1261  {
1262  vector<int> out;
1263 
1264  // Vertex
1265  if (type == zVertexData)
1266  {
1267  if (meshObj->mesh.vertices[index].getEdge())
1268  {
1269  zEdge* start = meshObj->mesh.vertices[index].getEdge();
1270  zEdge* e = start;
1271 
1272  bool exit = false;
1273 
1274  do
1275  {
1276  out.push_back(e->getEdgeId());
1277 
1278  //printf("\n %i %i ", e->getEdgeId(), start->getEdgeId());
1279 
1280  if (e->getPrev())
1281  {
1282  if (e->getPrev()->getSym()) e = e->getPrev()->getSym();
1283  else exit = true;
1284  }
1285  else exit = true;
1286 
1287  } while (e != start && !exit);
1288  }
1289  }
1290 
1291  // Edge
1292  else if (type == zEdgeData)
1293  {
1294  vector<int> connectedEdgestoVert0;
1295  getConnectedEdges(meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getVertex()->getVertexId(), zVertexData, connectedEdgestoVert0);
1296 
1297  vector<int> connectedEdgestoVert1;
1298  getConnectedEdges(meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getSym()->getVertex()->getVertexId(), zVertexData, connectedEdgestoVert1);
1299 
1300  for (int i = 0; i < connectedEdgestoVert0.size(); i++)
1301  {
1302  if (connectedEdgestoVert0[i] != index) out.push_back(connectedEdgestoVert0[i]);
1303  }
1304 
1305 
1306  for (int i = 0; i < connectedEdgestoVert1.size(); i++)
1307  {
1308  if (connectedEdgestoVert1[i] != index) out.push_back(connectedEdgestoVert1[i]);
1309  }
1310  }
1311 
1312  else throw std::invalid_argument(" error: invalid zHEData type");
1313 
1314  edgeIndicies = out;
1315  }

1432  bool onBoundary(int index, zHEData type = zVertexData)
1433  {
1434  bool out = false;
1435 
1436  // zMesh Vertex
1437  if (type == zVertexData && index != -1)
1438  {
1439 
1440  vector<int> connectedEdges;
1441  getConnectedEdges(index, type, connectedEdges);
1442 
1443  for (int i = 0; i < connectedEdges.size(); i++)
1444  {
1445  if (onBoundary(connectedEdges[i], zEdgeData))
1446  {
1447  out = true;
1448  break;
1449  }
1450  }
1451  }
1452 
1453  // Mesh Edge
1454  else if (type == zEdgeData && index != -1)
1455  {
1456  if (!meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getFace()) out = true;
1457  //else printf("\n face: %i", edges[index].getFace()->getFaceId());
1458  }
1459 
1460  // Mesh Face
1461  else if (type == zFaceData && index != -1)
1462  {
1463  vector<int> fEdges;
1464  getEdges(index, zFaceData, fEdges);
1465 
1466  for (int i = 0; i < fEdges.size(); i++)
1467  {
1468  if (onBoundary(fEdges[i], zEdgeData))
1469  {
1470  out = true;
1471  break;
1472  }
1473  }
1474  }
1475 
1476  else throw std::invalid_argument(" error: invalid zHEData type");
1477 
1478  return out;
1479  }

1769  void computeEdgeColorfromVertexColor()
1770  {
1771 
1772  for (int i = 0; i < meshObj->mesh.edgeActive.size(); i += 2)
1773  {
1774  if (meshObj->mesh.edgeActive[i])
1775  {
1776  int v0 = meshObj->mesh.edges[i].getVertex()->getVertexId();
1777  int v1 = meshObj->mesh.edges[i + 1].getVertex()->getVertexId();
1778 
1779  zColor col;
1780  col.r = (meshObj->mesh.vertexColors[v0].r + meshObj->mesh.vertexColors[v1].r) * 0.5;
1781  col.g = (meshObj->mesh.vertexColors[v0].g + meshObj->mesh.vertexColors[v1].g) * 0.5;
1782  col.b = (meshObj->mesh.vertexColors[v0].b + meshObj->mesh.vertexColors[v1].b) * 0.5;
1783  col.a = (meshObj->mesh.vertexColors[v0].a + meshObj->mesh.vertexColors[v1].a) * 0.5;
1784 
1785  if (meshObj->mesh.edgeColors.size() <= i) meshObj->mesh.edgeColors.push_back(col);
1786  else meshObj->mesh.edgeColors[i] = col;
1787 
1788  if (meshObj->mesh.edgeColors.size() <= i + 1) meshObj->mesh.edgeColors.push_back(col);
1789  else meshObj->mesh.edgeColors[i + 1] = col;
1790  }
1791 
1792 
1793  }
1794 
1795 
1796 
1797  }

1803  void computeVertexColorfromEdgeColor()
1804  {
1805  for (int i = 0; i < meshObj->mesh.vertexActive.size(); i++)
1806  {
1807  if (meshObj->mesh.vertexActive[i])
1808  {
1809  vector<int> cEdges;
1810  getConnectedEdges(i, zVertexData, cEdges);
1811 
1812  zColor col;
1813  for (int j = 0; j < cEdges.size(); j++)
1814  {
1815  col.r += meshObj->mesh.edgeColors[cEdges[j]].r;
1816  col.g += meshObj->mesh.edgeColors[cEdges[j]].g;
1817  col.b += meshObj->mesh.edgeColors[cEdges[j]].b;
1818  }
1819 
1820  col.r /= cEdges.size(); col.g /= cEdges.size(); col.b /= cEdges.size();
1821 
1822  meshObj->mesh.vertexColors[i] = col;
1823 
1824  }
1825  }
1826  }

1892  void smoothColors(int smoothVal = 1, zHEData type = zVertexData)
1893  {
1894  for (int j = 0; j < smoothVal; j++)
1895  {
1896  if (type == zVertexData)
1897  {
1898  vector<zColor> tempColors;
1899 
1900  for (int i = 0; i < meshObj->mesh.vertexActive.size(); i++)
1901  {
1902  zColor col;
1903  if (meshObj->mesh.vertexActive[i])
1904  {
1905  vector<int> cVerts;
1906  getConnectedVertices(i, zVertexData, cVerts);
1907 
1908  zColor currentCol = meshObj->mesh.vertexColors[i];
1909 
1910 
1911  for (int j = 0; j < cVerts.size(); j++)
1912  {
1913  col.r += meshObj->mesh.vertexColors[cVerts[j]].r;
1914  col.g += meshObj->mesh.vertexColors[cVerts[j]].g;
1915  col.b += meshObj->mesh.vertexColors[cVerts[j]].b;
1916  }
1917 
1918  col.r += (currentCol.r); col.g += (currentCol.g); col.b += (currentCol.b);
1919 
1920  col.r /= cVerts.size(); col.g /= cVerts.size(); col.b /= cVerts.size();
1921 
1922 
1923  }
1924 
1925  tempColors.push_back(col);
1926 
1927  }
1928 
1929  for (int i = 0; i < meshObj->mesh.vertexActive.size(); i++)
1930  {
1931  if (meshObj->mesh.vertexActive[i])
1932  {
1933  meshObj->mesh.vertexColors[i] = (tempColors[i]);
1934  }
1935  }
1936  }
1937 
1938 
1939  if (type == zFaceData)
1940  {
1941  vector<zColor> tempColors;
1942 
1943  for (int i = 0; i < meshObj->mesh.faceActive.size(); i++)
1944  {
1945  zColor col;
1946  if (meshObj->mesh.faceActive[i])
1947  {
1948  vector<int> cFaces;
1949  getConnectedFaces(i, zFaceData, cFaces);
1950 
1951  zColor currentCol = meshObj->mesh.faceColors[i];
1952  for (int j = 0; j < cFaces.size(); j++)
1953  {
1954  col.r += meshObj->mesh.faceColors[cFaces[j]].r;
1955  col.g += meshObj->mesh.faceColors[cFaces[j]].g;
1956  col.b += meshObj->mesh.faceColors[cFaces[j]].b;
1957  }
1958 
1959  col.r += (currentCol.r); col.g += (currentCol.g); col.b += (currentCol.b);
1960 
1961  col.r /= cFaces.size(); col.g /= cFaces.size(); col.b /= cFaces.size();
1962 
1963  }
1964 
1965  tempColors.push_back(col);
1966 
1967  }
1968 
1969  for (int i = 0; i < meshObj->mesh.faceActive.size(); i++)
1970  {
1971  if (meshObj->mesh.faceActive[i])
1972  {
1973  meshObj->mesh.faceColors[i] = (tempColors[i]);
1974  }
1975  }
1976  }
1977 
1978  else throw std::invalid_argument(" error: invalid zHEData type");
1979  }
1980 
1981 
1982 
1983  }

1989  void computeVertexNormalfromFaceNormal()
1990  {
1991 
1992  meshObj->mesh.vertexNormals.clear();
1993 
1994  for (int i = 0; i < meshObj->mesh.vertexActive.size(); i++)
1995  {
1996  if (meshObj->mesh.vertexActive[i])
1997  {
1998  vector<int> cFaces;
1999  getConnectedFaces(i, zVertexData, cFaces);
2000 
2001  zVector norm;
2002 
2003  for (int j = 0; j < cFaces.size(); j++)
2004  {
2005  norm += meshObj->mesh.faceNormals[cFaces[j]];
2006  }
2007 
2008  norm /= cFaces.size();
2009  norm.normalize();
2010  meshObj->mesh.vertexNormals.push_back(norm);
2011  }
2012  else meshObj->mesh.vertexNormals.push_back(zVector());
2013  }
2014 
2015  }
2016 
2021  void computeMeshNormals()
2022  {
2023  meshObj->mesh.faceNormals.clear();
2024 
2025  for (int i = 0; i < meshObj->mesh.faceActive.size(); i++)
2026  {
2027  if (meshObj->mesh.faceActive[i])
2028  {
2029  // get face vertices and correspondiing positions
2030 
2031  //printf("\n f %i :", i);
2032  vector<int> fVerts;
2033  getVertices(i, zFaceData, fVerts);
2034 
2035  zVector fCen; // face center
2036 
2037  vector<zVector> points;
2038  for (int i = 0; i < fVerts.size(); i++)
2039  {
2040  //printf(" %i ", fVerts[i]);
2041  points.push_back(meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[fVerts[i]]);
2042 
2043  fCen += meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[fVerts[i]];
2044  }
2045 
2046  fCen /= fVerts.size();
2047 
2048  zVector fNorm; // face normal
2049 
2050  if (fVerts.size() != 3)
2051  {
2052  for (int j = 0; j < fVerts.size(); j++)
2053  {
2054  fNorm += (points[j] - fCen) ^ (points[(j + 1) % fVerts.size()] - fCen);
2055 
2056 
2057  }
2058 
2059  }
2060  else
2061  {
2062  zVector cross = (points[1] - points[0]) ^ (points[fVerts.size() - 1] - points[0]);
2063  cross.normalize();
2064 
2065  fNorm = cross;
2066 
2067  //printf("\n working! %i ", i);
2068 
2069  }
2070 
2071 
2072  fNorm.normalize();
2073  meshObj->mesh.faceNormals.push_back(fNorm);
2074  }
2075  else meshObj->mesh.faceNormals.push_back(zVector());
2076 
2077  }
2078 
2079 
2080  // compute vertex normal
2081  computeVertexNormalfromFaceNormal();
2082  }

2090  void averageVertices(int numSteps = 1)
2091  {
2092  for (int k = 0; k < numSteps; k++)
2093  {
2094  vector<zVector> tempVertPos;
2095 
2096  for (int i = 0; i < meshObj->mesh.vertexActive.size(); i++)
2097  {
2098  tempVertPos.push_back(meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[i]);
2099 
2100  if (meshObj->mesh.vertexActive[i])
2101  {
2102  if (!checkVertexValency(i, 1))
2103  {
2104  vector<int> cVerts;
2105 
2106  getConnectedVertices(i, zVertexData, cVerts);
2107 
2108  for (int j = 0; j < cVerts.size(); j++)
2109  {
2110  zVector p = meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[cVerts[j]];
2111  tempVertPos[i] += p;
2112  }
2113 
2114  tempVertPos[i] /= (cVerts.size() + 1);
2115  }
2116  }
2117 
2118  }
2119 
2120  // update position
2121  for (int i = 0; i < tempVertPos.size(); i++) meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[i] = tempVertPos[i];
2122  }
2123 
2124  }

3080  void getFaceTriangles(int faceIndex, int &numTris, vector<int> &tris)

3084 
3085  vector<bool> ears;

3111 
3112  // Triangle edges - e1 and e2 defined above
3113  zVector v1 = meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[vertexIndices[nextId]] - meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[vertexIndices[i]];
3114  zVector v2 = meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[vertexIndices[prevId]] - meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[vertexIndices[i]];

3235  zVector p0 = meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[vertexIndices[i]];
3236  zVector p1 = meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[vertexIndices[nextId]];
3237  zVector p2 = meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[vertexIndices[prevId]];
3238 
3239  bool CheckPtTri = false;
3240 
3241  for (int j = 0; j < vertexIndices.size(); j++)
3242  {
3243  if (!CheckPtTri)
3244  {
3245  if (j != i && j != nextId && j != prevId)
3246  {
3247  // vector to point to be checked
3248  zVector pt = meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[vertexIndices[j]];
3249 
3250  bool Chk = meshObj->mesh.coreUtils.pointInTriangle(pt, p0, p1, p2);
3251  CheckPtTri = Chk;
3252  }
3253  }
3254 
3255  }
3256 
3257  if (CheckPtTri) ear = false;
3258  ears.push_back(ear);
3259 
3260  }
3261  else ears.push_back(false);
3262 
3263 
3264  //printf("\n earId %i id: %i ang: %1.2f reflex: %s ear: %s", earId, vertexIndices[i], ang, (reflexVerts[i] == true) ? "true" : "false", (ears[i] == true) ? "true" : "false");
3265  }
3266 
3267 
3268 
3269  }
3270  else
3271  {
3272  for (int i = 0; i < vertexIndices.size(); i++)
3273  {
3274  //printf("\n %1.2f %1.2f %1.2f ", meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[vertexIndices[i]].x, meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[vertexIndices[i]].y, meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[vertexIndices[i]].z);
3275  }
3276 
3277  throw std::invalid_argument(" error: no ears found in the face, triangulation is not succesful.");
3278  }
3279 
3280  }
3281 
3282  // add the last remaining triangle
3283  tris.push_back(vertexIndices[0]);
3284  tris.push_back(vertexIndices[1]);
3285  tris.push_back(vertexIndices[2]);
3286  numTris++;
3287 
3288  }

3429  void getPrincipalCurvature(vector<zCurvature> &vertexCurvatures)
3430  {
3431  for (int j = 0; j < numVertices(); j++)
3432  {
3433 
3434  if (meshObj->mesh.vertexActive[j])
3435  {
3436  double angleSum = 0;
3437  double cotangentSum = 0;
3438  double areaSum = 0;
3439  double areaSumMixed = 0;
3440  double edgeLengthSquare = 0;
3441  float gaussianCurv = 0;
3442  float gaussianAngle = 0;
3443 
3444  zCurvature curv;
3445  curv.k1 = 0;
3446  curv.k2 = 0;
3447 
3448  zVector meanCurvNormal;
3449 
3450  if (!onBoundary(j, zVertexData))
3451  {
3452  vector<int> connectedvertices;
3453  getConnectedVertices(j, zVertexData, connectedvertices);
3454 
3455  zVector pt = meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[j];
3456 
3457  float multFactor = 0.125;
3458  for (int i = 0; i < connectedvertices.size(); i++)
3459  {
3460  int next = (i + 1) % connectedvertices.size();
3461  int prev = (i + connectedvertices.size() - 1) % connectedvertices.size();
3462 
3463  zVector pt1 = meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[connectedvertices[i]];
3464  zVector pt2 = meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[connectedvertices[next]];
3465  zVector pt3 = meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[connectedvertices[prev]];
3466 
3467  zVector cr = (pt1 - pt) ^ (pt2 - pt);
3468 
3469  float ang = (pt1 - pt).angle(pt2 - pt);
3470  angleSum += ang;
3471  cotangentSum += (((pt2 - pt)*(pt1 - pt)) / cr.length());
3472 
3473 
3474  float e_Length = (pt1 - pt2).length();
3475 
3476  edgeLengthSquare += (e_Length * e_Length);
3477 
3478  zVector cr_alpha = (pt - pt1) ^ (pt2 - pt1);
3479  zVector cr_beta = (pt - pt1) ^ (pt3 - pt1);
3480 
3481  float coTan_alpha = (((pt - pt1)*(pt2 - pt1)) / cr_alpha.length());
3482  float coTan_beta = (((pt - pt1)*(pt3 - pt1)) / cr_beta.length());
3483 
3484  // check if triangle is obtuse
3485  if ((pt1 - pt).angle(pt2 - pt) <= 90 && (pt - pt1).angle(pt2 - pt1) <= 90 && (pt1 - pt2).angle(pt - pt2) <= 90)
3486  {
3487  areaSumMixed += (coTan_alpha + coTan_beta) * edgeLengthSquare * 0.125;
3488  }
3489  else
3490  {
3491 
3492  double triArea = (((pt1 - pt) ^ (pt2 - pt)).length()) / 2;
3493 
3494  if ((ang) <= 90) areaSumMixed += triArea * 0.25;
3495  else areaSumMixed += triArea * 0.5;
3496 
3497  }
3498 
3499  meanCurvNormal += ((pt - pt1)*(coTan_alpha + coTan_beta));
3500  }
3501 
3502  meanCurvNormal /= (2 * areaSumMixed);
3503 
3504  gaussianCurv = (360 - angleSum) / ((0.5 * areaSum) - (multFactor * cotangentSum * edgeLengthSquare));
3505  //outGauss.push_back(gaussianCurv);
3506 
3508 
3509  //gaussianCurv = (360 - angleSum) / areaSumMixed;
3510 
3511  double meanCurv = (meanCurvNormal.length() / 2);
3512  //if (meanCurv <0.001) meanCurv = 0;
3513 
3514  double deltaX = (meanCurv*meanCurv) - gaussianCurv;
3515  if (deltaX < 0) deltaX = 0;
3516 
3517 
3518  curv.k1 = meanCurv + sqrt(deltaX);
3519  curv.k2 = meanCurv - sqrt(deltaX);
3520 
3521  }
3522 
3523  vertexCurvatures.push_back(curv);
3524  }
3525 
3526  else
3527  {
3528  zCurvature curv;
3529 
3530  curv.k1 = -1;
3531  curv.k2 = -1;
3532 
3533  vertexCurvatures.push_back(curv);
3534  }
3535  }
3536  }

3543  void getEdgeDihedralAngles(vector<double> &dihedralAngles)
3544  {
3545  vector<double> out;
3546 
3547  if (meshObj->mesh.faceNormals.size() != meshObj->mesh.faceActive.size()) computeMeshNormals();
3548 
3549  for (int i = 0; i < meshObj->mesh.edgeActive.size(); i += 2)
3550  {

3552  {
3553  if (!onBoundary(i, zEdgeData) && !onBoundary(i + 1, zEdgeData))
3554  {
3555  // get connected face to edge
3556  vector<int> cFaces;
3557  getFaces(i, zEdgeData, cFaces);
3558

3560  zVector n1 = meshObj->mesh.faceNormals[cFaces[1]];

3566

3569  out.push_back(di_ang);
3570 
3571  }
3572  else
3573  {
3574  // per half edge
3575  out.push_back(-1);
3576  out.push_back(-1);
3577  }
3578  }
3579  else
3580  {
3581  // per half edge
3582  out.push_back(-2);
3583  out.push_back(-2);
3584  }
3585 
3586 
3587  }
3588 
3589  dihedralAngles = out;

3915  void faceTriangulate(int faceIndex)
3916  {
3917 
3918  if (meshObj->mesh.faceNormals.size() == 0 || meshObj->mesh.faceNormals.size() != meshObj->mesh.faceActive.size())computeMeshNormals();
3919 
3920  vector<int> fVerts;
3921  getVertices(faceIndex, zFaceData, fVerts);
3922 
3923  //printf("\n %i : nV %i ", i, fVerts.size());
3924 
3925  int numfaces_original = meshObj->mesh.faceActive.size();
3926  int numEdges_original = meshObj->mesh.edgeActive.size();
3927 
3928  if (fVerts.size() != 3)
3929  {
3930  // compute polygon Triangles
3931  int n_Tris = 0;
3932  vector<int> Tri_connects;
3933  getFaceTriangles( faceIndex, n_Tris, Tri_connects);
3934 
3935  //printf("\n %i numtris: %i %i ",i, n_Tris, Tri_connects.size());
3936

3938  {
3939  vector<int> triVerts;
3940  triVerts.push_back(Tri_connects[j * 3]);
3941  triVerts.push_back(Tri_connects[j * 3 + 1]);
3942  triVerts.push_back(Tri_connects[j * 3 + 2]);
3943 
3944  //printf("\n %i %i %i ", Tri_connects[j * 3], Tri_connects[j * 3 + 1], Tri_connects[j * 3 + 2]);
3945 
3946  // check if edges e01, e12 or e20
3947  int e01_ID, e12_ID, e20_ID;
3948  bool e01_Boundary = false;
3949  bool e12_Boundary = false;
3950  bool e20_Boundary = false;
3951 
3952  for (int k = 0; k < triVerts.size(); k++)
3953  {
3954  int e;
3955  bool eExists = meshObj->mesh.edgeExists(triVerts[k], triVerts[(k + 1) % triVerts.size()], e);
3956 
3957 
3958  if (k == 0)
3959  {
3960 
3961  if (eExists)
3962  {
3963  e01_ID = e;
3964 
3965  if (e01_ID < numEdges_original)
3966  {
3967  if (onBoundary(e, zEdgeData))
3968  {
3969  e01_Boundary = true;
3970 
3971  }
3972  }
3973 
3974 
3975  }
3976  else
3977  {
3978  meshObj->mesh.addEdges(triVerts[k], triVerts[(k + 1) % triVerts.size()]);
3979  e01_ID = meshObj->mesh.edgeActive.size() - 2;
3980 
3981 
3982  }
3983  }
3984 
3985 
3986  if (k == 1)
3987  {
3988  if (eExists)
3989  {
3990  e12_ID = e;
3991 
3992  if (e12_ID < numEdges_original)
3993  {
3994  if (onBoundary(e, zEdgeData))
3995  {
3996  e12_Boundary = true;
3997  }
3998  }
3999 
4000  }
4001  else
4002  {
4003  meshObj->mesh.addEdges(triVerts[k], triVerts[(k + 1) % triVerts.size()]);
4004 
4005  e12_ID = meshObj->mesh.edgeActive.size() - 2;
4006  }
4007  }
4008 
4009 
4010 
4011  if (k == 2)
4012  {
4013  if (eExists)
4014  {
4015 
4016  e20_ID = e;
4017 
4018  if (e20_ID < numEdges_original)
4019  {
4020  if (onBoundary(e, zEdgeData))
4021  {
4022  e20_Boundary = true;
4023 
4024  }
4025  }
4026 
4027  }
4028  else
4029  {
4030  meshObj->mesh.addEdges(triVerts[k], triVerts[(k + 1) % triVerts.size()]);
4031  e20_ID = meshObj->mesh.edgeActive.size() - 2;
4032  }
4033 
4034  }
4035 
4036 
4037 
4038  }
4039 
4040  zEdge* e01 = &meshObj->mesh.edges[e01_ID];
4041  zEdge* e12 = &meshObj->mesh.edges[e12_ID];
4042  zEdge* e20 = &meshObj->mesh.edges[e20_ID];
4043 
4044  //printf("\n %i %i %i ", e01_ID, e12_ID, e20_ID);
4045 
4046 
4047  if (j > 0)
4048  {
4049  meshObj->mesh.addPolygon();
4050  meshObj->mesh.faces[meshObj->mesh.faceActive.size() - 1].setEdge(e01);
4051 
4052  if (!e01_Boundary) e01->setFace(&meshObj->mesh.faces[meshObj->mesh.faceActive.size() - 1]);
4053  if (!e12_Boundary) e12->setFace(&meshObj->mesh.faces[meshObj->mesh.faceActive.size() - 1]);
4054  if (!e20_Boundary) e20->setFace(&meshObj->mesh.faces[meshObj->mesh.faceActive.size() - 1]);
4055  }
4056  else
4057  {
4058  if (!e01_Boundary) meshObj->mesh.faces[faceIndex].setEdge(e01);
4059  else if (!e12_Boundary) meshObj->mesh.faces[faceIndex].setEdge(e12);
4060  else if (!e20_Boundary) meshObj->mesh.faces[faceIndex].setEdge(e20);
4061 
4062 
4063  if (!e01_Boundary) e01->setFace(&meshObj->mesh.faces[faceIndex]);
4064  if (!e12_Boundary) e12->setFace(&meshObj->mesh.faces[faceIndex]);
4065  if (!e20_Boundary) e20->setFace(&meshObj->mesh.faces[faceIndex]);
4066  }
4067 
4068  // update edge pointers
4069  e01->setNext(e12);
4070  e01->setPrev(e20);
4071  e12->setNext(e20);
4072 
4073  }
4074  }
4075 
4076  }

4082  void triangulate()
4083  {
4084 
4085  if (meshObj->mesh.faceNormals.size() == 0 || meshObj->mesh.faceNormals.size() != meshObj->mesh.faceActive.size()) computeMeshNormals();
4086 
4087 
4088 
4089  // iterate through faces and triangulate faces with more than 3 vetices
4090  int numfaces_original = meshObj->mesh.faceActive.size();
4091 
4092  int numEdges_original = meshObj->mesh.edgeActive.size();
4093  //printf("\n numfaces_before: %i ", numfaces_before);
4094 
4095  for (int i = 0; i < numfaces_original; i++)
4096  {
4097  if (!meshObj->mesh.faceActive[i]) continue;
4098 
4099  faceTriangulate(i);
4100 
4101  }
4102 
4103 
4104  computeMeshNormals();
4105 
4106  }

4118  void deleteVertex(int index, bool removeInactiveElems = true)
4119  {
4120  if (index > meshObj->mesh.vertexActive.size()) throw std::invalid_argument(" error: index out of bounds.");
4121  if (!meshObj->mesh.vertexActive[index]) throw std::invalid_argument(" error: index out of bounds.");
4122 
4123  // check if boundary vertex
4124  bool boundaryVertex = (onBoundary(index, zVertexData));
4125 
4126  // get connected faces
4127  vector<int> cFaces;
4128  getConnectedFaces(index, zVertexData, cFaces);
4129 
4130  // get connected edges
4131  vector<int> cEdges;
4132  getConnectedEdges(index, zVertexData, cEdges);
4133 
4134 
4135 
4136  // get vertices in cyclical orders without the the vertex to be removed. remove duplicates if any
4137  vector<int> outerVertices;
4138 
4139  vector<int> deactivateVertices;
4140  vector<int> deactivateEdges;
4141 
4142  deactivateVertices.push_back(index);
4143 
4144  // add to deactivate edges connected edges
4145  for (int i = 0; i < cEdges.size(); i++) deactivateEdges.push_back(cEdges[i]);
4146 
4147  // add to deactivate vertices with valence 2 and connected edges of that vertex
4148  for (int i = 0; i < cEdges.size(); i++)
4149  {
4150  int v0 = meshObj->mesh.edges[cEdges[i]].getVertex()->getVertexId();
4151 
4152  if (!onBoundary(v0, zVertexData) && checkVertexValency(v0, 2))
4153  {
4154  deactivateVertices.push_back(v0);
4155  deactivateEdges.push_back(meshObj->mesh.edges[cEdges[i]].getNext()->getEdgeId());
4156  }
4157  }
4158 
4159  // compute new face vertices
4160  for (int i = 0; i < cEdges.size(); i++)
4161  {
4162  if (!meshObj->mesh.edges[cEdges[i]].getFace()) continue;
4163 
4164  zEdge *curEdge = &meshObj->mesh.edges[cEdges[i]];
4165  int v0 = curEdge->getVertex()->getVertexId();
4166 
4167  do
4168  {
4169  bool vertExists = false;
4170 
4171  for (int k = 0; k < outerVertices.size(); k++)
4172  {
4173  if (v0 == outerVertices[k])
4174  {
4175  vertExists = true;
4176  break;
4177  }
4178  }
4179 
4180  if (!vertExists)
4181  {
4182  for (int k = 0; k < deactivateVertices.size(); k++)
4183  {
4184  if (v0 == deactivateVertices[k])
4185  {
4186  vertExists = true;
4187  break;
4188  }
4189  }
4190  }
4191 
4192  if (!vertExists) outerVertices.push_back(v0);
4193 
4194 
4195 
4196  curEdge = curEdge->getNext();
4197  v0 = curEdge->getVertex()->getVertexId();
4198 
4199 
4200  } while (v0 != index);
4201 
4202  }
4203 
4204 
4205  // deactivate connected edges
4206  for (int i = 0; i < deactivateEdges.size(); i++)
4207  {
4208  if (meshObj->mesh.edgeActive[deactivateEdges[i]])deactivateElement(deactivateEdges[i], zEdgeData);
4209  }
4210 
4211  // disable connected faces
4212  for (int i = 0; i < cFaces.size(); i++)
4213  {
4214  if (meshObj->mesh.faceActive[cFaces[i]]) deactivateElement(cFaces[i], zFaceData);
4215  }
4216 
4217  // deactivate vertex
4218  for (int i = 0; i < deactivateVertices.size(); i++)
4219  {
4220  if (meshObj->mesh.vertexActive[deactivateVertices[i]]) deactivateElement(deactivateVertices[i], zVertexData);
4221  }
4222 
4223 
4224 
4225  // add new face if outerVertices has more than 2 vertices
4226 
4227  if (outerVertices.size() > 2)
4228  {
4229  meshObj->mesh.addPolygon(outerVertices);
4230 
4231  if (boundaryVertex) meshObj->mesh.update_BoundaryEdgePointers();
4232  }
4233 
4234  computeMeshNormals();
4235 
4236  if (removeInactiveElems)
4237  {
4238  removeInactiveElements(zVertexData);
4239  removeInactiveElements(zEdgeData);
4240  removeInactiveElements(zFaceData);
4241  }
4242  }
4243 
4244 
4251  void deleteFace(int index, bool removeInactiveElems = true)
4252  {
4253  if (index > meshObj->mesh.faceActive.size()) throw std::invalid_argument(" error: index out of bounds.");
4254  if (!meshObj->mesh.faceActive[index]) throw std::invalid_argument(" error: index out of bounds.");
4255 
4256  // check if there is only 1 polygon. If true, cant perform collapse.
4257  if (numPolygons() == 1)
4258  {
4259  printf("\n Can't delete on single face mesh.");
4260  return;
4261  }
4262 
4263  // get faces vertices
4264  vector<int> fVerts;
4265  getVertices(index, zFaceData, fVerts);
4266 
4267 
4268 
4269  // get face edges.
4270  vector<int> fEdges;
4271  getEdges(index, zFaceData, fEdges);
4272 
4273  // connected edge for each face vertex
4274  vector<int> fVertsValence;
4275  for (int i = 0; i < fVerts.size(); i++)
4276  {
4277 
4278  vector<int> cEdges;
4279  getConnectedEdges(fVerts[i], zVertexData, cEdges);
4280  fVertsValence.push_back(cEdges.size());
4281 
4282  // update vertex edge pointer if ther are pointing to face edges , as they will be disabled.
4283 
4284  for (int j = 0; j < cEdges.size(); j++)
4285  {
4286  bool chk = false;
4287 
4288  for (int k = 0; k < fEdges.size(); k++)
4289  {
4290  int sEdge = meshObj->mesh.edges[fEdges[k]].getSym()->getEdgeId();
4291 
4292  if (cEdges[j] == fEdges[k] || cEdges[j] == sEdge)
4293  {
4294  chk = true;
4295  break;
4296  }
4297  }
4298 
4299  if (!chk)
4300  {
4301  meshObj->mesh.vertices[fVerts[i]].setEdge(&meshObj->mesh.edges[cEdges[j]]);
4302  break;
4303  }
4304  }
4305 
4306  }
4307 
4308  // make face edges as boundary edges, and disable them if both half edges have null face pointers.
4309  for (int i = 0; i < fEdges.size(); i++)
4310  {
4311  meshObj->mesh.edges[fEdges[i]].setFace(nullptr);
4312 
4313  int symEdge = meshObj->mesh.edges[fEdges[i]].getSym()->getEdgeId();
4314 
4315  if (onBoundary(fEdges[i], zEdgeData) && onBoundary(symEdge, zEdgeData))
4316  {
4317  deactivateElement(fEdges[i], zEdgeData);
4318  }
4319  }
4320 
4321  // get face vertices and deactivate them if all connected half edges are in active.
4322  for (int i = 0; i < fVerts.size(); i++)
4323  {
4324  bool removeVertex = true;
4325  if (fVertsValence[i] > 2) removeVertex = false;
4326 
4327 
4328  if (removeVertex)
4329  {
4330  deactivateElement(fVerts[i], zVertexData);
4331  }
4332 
4333  }
4334 
4335 
4336  // deactivate face
4337  deactivateElement(index, zFaceData);
4338 
4339 
4340  if (removeInactiveElems)
4341  {
4342  removeInactiveElements(zVertexData);
4343  removeInactiveElements(zEdgeData);
4344  removeInactiveElements(zFaceData);
4345  }
4346 
4347  }
4348 
4355  void deleteEdge( int index, bool removeInactiveElements = true);
4356

4358  //---- TOPOLOGY MODIFIER METHODS
4359  //--------------------------
4360 
4368  void collapseEdge( int index, double edgeFactor = 0.5, bool removeInactiveElems = true)
4369  {
4370  if (index > meshObj->mesh.edgeActive.size()) throw std::invalid_argument(" error: index out of bounds.");
4371  if (!meshObj->mesh.edgeActive[index]) throw std::invalid_argument(" error: index out of bounds.");
4372 
4373  int nFVerts = (onBoundary(index, zEdgeData)) ? 0 : getNumPolygonVertices( meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getFace()->getFaceId());
4374 
4375  int sEdge = meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getSym()->getEdgeId();
4376  int nFVerts_Sym = (onBoundary(sEdge, zEdgeData)) ? 0 : getNumPolygonVertices( meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getFace()->getFaceId());
4377 
4378  // check if there is only 1 polygon and its a triangle. If true, cant perform collapse.
4379  if (numPolygons() == 1)
4380  {
4381  if (nFVerts == 3 || nFVerts_Sym == 3)
4382  {
4383  printf("\n Can't perform collapse on single trianglular face.");
4384  return;
4385  }
4386 
4387  }
4388 
4389  // get edge faces
4390  vector<int> eFaces;
4391  getFaces(index, zEdgeData, eFaces);
4392 
4393  if (numPolygons() == eFaces.size())
4394  {
4395  if (nFVerts == nFVerts_Sym && nFVerts_Sym == 3)
4396  {
4397  printf("\n Can't perform collapse on common edge of 2 triangular face mesh.");
4398  return;
4399  }
4400 
4401  }
4402 
4403  int v1 = meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getVertex()->getVertexId();
4404  int v2 = meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getVertex()->getVertexId();
4405 
4406  int vertexRemoveID = v1;
4407  int vertexRetainID = v2;
4408 
4409  if (getVertexValence(v1) > getVertexValence(v2))
4410  {
4411  vertexRemoveID = v2;
4412  vertexRetainID = v1;
4413 
4414  edgeFactor = 1 - edgeFactor;
4415 
4416  }
4417 
4418  // set new position of retained vertex
4419  zVector e = meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[vertexRemoveID] - meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[vertexRetainID];
4420  double eLength = e.length();
4421  e.normalize();
4422 
4423  meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[vertexRetainID] = meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[vertexRetainID] + e * (edgeFactor * eLength);
4424 
4425 
4426  // get connected edges of vertexRemoveID
4427  vector<int> cEdges;
4428  getConnectedEdges(vertexRemoveID, zVertexData, cEdges);
4429 
4430 
4431  // get connected edges
4432 
4433  int vNext = meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getNext()->getVertex()->getVertexId();
4434  vector<int> cEdgesVNext;
4435  getConnectedEdges(vNext, zVertexData, cEdgesVNext);
4436 
4437  int vPrev = meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getPrev()->getVertex()->getVertexId();
4438  vector<int> cEdgesVPrev;
4439  getConnectedEdges(vPrev, zVertexData, cEdgesVPrev);
4440 
4441  int vNext_sEdge = meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getNext()->getVertex()->getVertexId();
4442  vector<int> cEdgesVNext_sEdge;
4443  getConnectedEdges(vNext_sEdge, zVertexData, cEdgesVNext_sEdge);
4444 
4445  int vPrev_sEdge = meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getPrev()->getVertex()->getVertexId();
4446  vector<int> cEdgesVPrev_sEdge;
4447  getConnectedEdges(vPrev_sEdge, zVertexData, cEdgesVPrev_sEdge);
4448 
4449  // current edge
4450  if (nFVerts == 3)
4451  {
4452 
4453  // update pointers
4454  meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getNext()->setNext(meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getPrev()->getSym()->getNext());
4455  meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getNext()->setPrev(meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getPrev()->getSym()->getPrev());
4456 
4457  meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getPrev()->setPrev(nullptr);
4458  meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getPrev()->setNext(nullptr);
4459 
4460  meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getPrev()->getSym()->setPrev(nullptr);
4461  meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getPrev()->getSym()->setNext(nullptr);
4462 
4463  meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getNext()->setFace(meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getPrev()->getSym()->getFace());
4464 
4465  if (meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getPrev()->getSym()->getFace())
4466  {
4467  meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getPrev()->getSym()->getFace()->setEdge(meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getNext());
4468  meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getPrev()->getSym()->setFace(nullptr);
4469  }
4470 
4471  // update vertex edge pointer if pointing to prev edge
4472 
4473  if (meshObj->mesh.vertices[vNext].getEdge()->getEdgeId() == meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getPrev()->getEdgeId())
4474  {
4475  for (int i = 0; i < cEdgesVNext.size(); i++)
4476  {
4477  if (cEdgesVNext[i] != meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getPrev()->getEdgeId())
4478  {
4479  meshObj->mesh.vertices[vNext].setEdge(&meshObj->mesh.edges[cEdgesVNext[i]]);
4480  }
4481  }
4482  }
4483 
4484  // update vertex edge pointer if pointing to prev edge
4485 
4486  if (meshObj->mesh.vertices[vPrev].getEdge()->getEdgeId() == meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getPrev()->getSym()->getEdgeId() || meshObj->mesh.vertices[vPrev].getEdge()->getEdgeId() == index)
4487  {
4488  for (int i = 0; i < cEdgesVPrev.size(); i++)
4489  {
4490  if (cEdgesVPrev[i] != meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getPrev()->getSym()->getEdgeId() && cEdgesVPrev[i] != index)
4491  {
4492  meshObj->mesh.vertices[vPrev].setEdge(&meshObj->mesh.edges[cEdgesVPrev[i]]);
4493  }
4494  }
4495  }
4496 
4497  // decativate prev edge
4498  deactivateElement(meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getPrev()->getEdgeId(), zEdgeData);
4499 
4500  // decativate next and sym pointer of the next edge are same, deactivate edge
4501  if (meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getNext()->getNext() == meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getNext()->getSym())
4502  {
4503 
4504  deactivateElement(meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getNext()->getEdgeId(), zEdgeData);
4505  deactivateElement(vNext, zVertexData);
4506  }
4507 
4508  // decativate prev and sym pointer of the next edge are same, deactivate edge
4509  else if (meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getNext()->getPrev() == meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getNext()->getSym())
4510  {
4511  deactivateElement(meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getNext()->getVertex()->getVertexId(), zVertexData);
4512  deactivateElement(vNext, zVertexData);
4513  }
4514 
4515  // deactivate face pointed by collapse edge
4516  deactivateElement(meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getFace()->getFaceId(), zFaceData);
4517 
4518  meshObj->mesh.edges[index].setFace(nullptr);
4519 
4520  meshObj->mesh.edges[index].setNext(nullptr);
4521  meshObj->mesh.edges[index].setPrev(nullptr);
4522 
4523  }
4524  else
4525  {
4526  // update vertex edge pointer if pointing to current edge
4527  if (meshObj->mesh.vertices[vPrev].getEdge()->getEdgeId() == meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getEdgeId())
4528  {
4529  meshObj->mesh.vertices[vPrev].setEdge(meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getPrev()->getSym());
4530  }
4531 
4532  // update pointers
4533  meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getNext()->setPrev(meshObj->mesh.edges[index].getPrev());
4534 
4535  meshObj->mesh.edges[index].setNext(nullptr);
4536  meshObj->mesh.edges[index].setPrev(nullptr);
4537  }
4538 
4539  // symmetry edge
4540  if (nFVerts_Sym == 3)
4541  {
4542 
4543 
4544  // update pointers
4545  meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getNext()->setNext(meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getPrev()->getSym()->getNext());
4546  meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getNext()->setPrev(meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getPrev()->getSym()->getPrev());
4547 
4548  meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getPrev()->setPrev(nullptr);
4549  meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getPrev()->setNext(nullptr);
4550 
4551  meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getPrev()->getSym()->setPrev(nullptr);
4552  meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getPrev()->getSym()->setNext(nullptr);
4553 
4554  meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getNext()->setFace(meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getPrev()->getSym()->getFace());
4555 
4556  if (meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getPrev()->getSym()->getFace())
4557  {
4558  meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getPrev()->getSym()->getFace()->setEdge(meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getNext());
4559  meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getPrev()->getSym()->setFace(nullptr);
4560  }
4561 
4562  // update vertex edge pointer if pointing to prev edge
4563 
4564  if (meshObj->mesh.vertices[vNext_sEdge].getEdge()->getEdgeId() == meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getPrev()->getEdgeId())
4565  {
4566  for (int i = 0; i < cEdgesVNext_sEdge.size(); i++)
4567  {
4568  if (cEdgesVNext_sEdge[i] != meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getPrev()->getEdgeId())
4569  {
4570  meshObj->mesh.vertices[vNext_sEdge].setEdge(&meshObj->mesh.edges[cEdgesVNext_sEdge[i]]);
4571  }
4572  }
4573  }
4574 
4575  // update vertex edge pointer if pointing to prev edge
4576 
4577  if (meshObj->mesh.vertices[vPrev_sEdge].getEdge()->getEdgeId() == meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getPrev()->getSym()->getEdgeId() || meshObj->mesh.vertices[vPrev_sEdge].getEdge()->getEdgeId() == sEdge)
4578  {
4579  for (int i = 0; i < cEdgesVPrev_sEdge.size(); i++)
4580  {
4581  if (cEdgesVPrev_sEdge[i] != meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getPrev()->getSym()->getEdgeId() && cEdgesVPrev_sEdge[i] != sEdge)
4582  {
4583  meshObj->mesh.vertices[vPrev_sEdge].setEdge(&meshObj->mesh.edges[cEdgesVPrev_sEdge[i]]);
4584  }
4585  }
4586  }
4587 
4588  // decativate prev edge
4589  deactivateElement(meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getPrev()->getEdgeId(), zEdgeData);
4590 
4591  // decativate next and sym pointer of the next edge are same, deactivate edge
4592  if (meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getNext()->getNext() == meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getNext()->getSym())
4593  {
4594  deactivateElement(meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getNext()->getEdgeId(), zEdgeData);
4595  deactivateElement(vNext_sEdge, zVertexData);
4596  }
4597 
4598  // decativate prev and sym pointer of the next edge are same, deactivate edge
4599  else if (meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getNext()->getPrev() == meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getNext()->getSym())
4600  {
4601  deactivateElement(meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getNext()->getEdgeId(), zEdgeData);
4602  deactivateElement(vNext_sEdge, zVertexData);
4603  }
4604 
4605  // deactivate face pointed by collapse edge
4606  deactivateElement(meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getFace()->getFaceId(), zFaceData);
4607 
4608  meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].setFace(nullptr);
4609 
4610  meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].setNext(nullptr);
4611  meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].setPrev(nullptr);
4612 
4613  }
4614  else
4615  {
4616  // update vertex edge pointer if pointing to current edge
4617  if (meshObj->mesh.vertices[vPrev_sEdge].getEdge()->getEdgeId() == meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getEdgeId())
4618  {
4619  meshObj->mesh.vertices[vPrev_sEdge].setEdge(meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getPrev()->getSym());
4620  }
4621 
4622  // update pointers
4623  meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getNext()->setPrev(meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].getPrev());
4624 
4625  meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].setNext(nullptr);
4626  meshObj->mesh.edges[sEdge].setPrev(nullptr);
4627  }
4628 
4629  // update connected edges verter pointer
4630  for (int i = 0; i < cEdges.size(); i++)
4631  {
4632  if (meshObj->mesh.edgeActive[cEdges[i]])
4633  {
4634  int v1 = meshObj->mesh.edges[cEdges[i]].getVertex()->getVertexId();
4635  int v2 = vertexRemoveID;
4636  meshObj->mesh.removeFromVerticesEdge(v1, v2);
4637 
4638  meshObj->mesh.edges[cEdges[i]].getSym()->setVertex(&meshObj->mesh.vertices[vertexRetainID]);
4639 
4640  meshObj->mesh.addToVerticesEdge(v1, vertexRetainID, cEdges[i]);
4641  }
4642  }
4643 
4644 
4645  // deactivate collapse edge
4646  if (meshObj->mesh.edgeActive[index])
4647  {
4648  deactivateElement(index, zEdgeData);
4649  }
4650 
4651  // deactivate vertexRemoveID
4652  if (meshObj->mesh.vertexActive[vertexRemoveID])
4653  {
4654  deactivateElement(vertexRemoveID, zVertexData);
4655  }
4656 
4657  // compute normals
4658  computeMeshNormals();
4659 
4660 
4661  // remove inactive elements
4662  if (removeInactiveElems)
4663  {
4664  removeInactiveElements(zVertexData);
4665  removeInactiveElements(zEdgeData);
4666  removeInactiveElements(zFaceData);
4667  }
4668 
4669  }

4679  int splitEdge(int index, double edgeFactor = 0.5, bool fTriangulate = false)
4680  {
4681  if (index > meshObj->mesh.edgeActive.size()) throw std::invalid_argument(" error: index out of bounds.");
4682  if (!meshObj->mesh.edgeActive[index]) throw std::invalid_argument(" error: index out of bounds.");
4683 
4684  vector<int> eFaces;
4685  getFaces(index, zEdgeData, eFaces);
4686 
4687  zEdge* edgetoSplit = &meshObj->mesh.edges[index];
4688  zEdge* edgetoSplitSym = edgetoSplit->getSym();
4689 
4690  zEdge* e_next = edgetoSplit->getNext();
4691  zEdge* e_prev = edgetoSplit->getPrev();
4692 
4693  zEdge* es_next = edgetoSplitSym->getNext();
4694  zEdge* es_prev = edgetoSplitSym->getPrev();
4695 
4696 
4697  zVector edgeDir = meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[edgetoSplit->getVertex()->getVertexId()] - meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[edgetoSplitSym->getVertex()->getVertexId()];
4698  double edgeLength = edgeDir.length();
4699  edgeDir.normalize();
4700 
4701  zVector newVertPos = meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[edgetoSplitSym->getVertex()->getVertexId()] + edgeDir * edgeFactor * edgeLength;
4702 
4703 
4704 
4705  // check if vertex exists if not add new vertex
4706  int VertId;
4707  bool vExists = vertexExists(newVertPos, VertId);
4708  if (!vExists)
4709  {
4710  meshObj->mesh.addVertex(newVertPos);
4711  VertId = meshObj->mesh.vertexActive.size() - 1;
4712  }
4713 
4714  //printf("\n newVert: %1.2f %1.2f %1.2f %s ", newVertPos.x, newVertPos.y, newVertPos.z, (vExists)?"true":"false");
4715 
4716  if (!vExists)
4717  {
4718  // remove from verticesEdge map
4719  meshObj->mesh.removeFromVerticesEdge(edgetoSplit->getVertex()->getVertexId(), edgetoSplitSym->getVertex()->getVertexId());
4720 
4721  // add new edges
4722  int v1 = VertId;
4723  int v2 = edgetoSplit->getVertex()->getVertexId();
4724  bool edgesResize = meshObj->mesh.addEdges(v1, v2);
4725 
4726  // recompute pointers if resize is true
4727  if (edgesResize)
4728  {
4729  edgetoSplit = &meshObj->mesh.edges[index];
4730  edgetoSplitSym = edgetoSplit->getSym();
4731 
4732  e_next = edgetoSplit->getNext();
4733  e_prev = edgetoSplit->getPrev();
4734 
4735  es_next = edgetoSplitSym->getNext();
4736  es_prev = edgetoSplitSym->getPrev();
4737 
4738  //printf("\n working!");
4739 
4740  }
4741 
4742  // update vertex pointers
4743  meshObj->mesh.vertices[v1].setEdge(&meshObj->mesh.edges[meshObj->mesh.edgeActive.size() - 2]);
4744  meshObj->mesh.vertices[v2].setEdge(&meshObj->mesh.edges[meshObj->mesh.edgeActive.size() - 1]);
4745 
4747  edgetoSplit->setVertex(&meshObj->mesh.vertices[VertId]); // current edge vertex pointer updated to new added vertex
4748 
4749  meshObj->mesh.edges[meshObj->mesh.edgeActive.size() - 1].setNext(edgetoSplitSym); // new added edge next pointer to point to the next of current edge
4750  meshObj->mesh.edges[meshObj->mesh.edgeActive.size() - 1].setPrev(es_prev);
4751 
4752  if (edgetoSplitSym->getFace()) meshObj->mesh.edges[meshObj->mesh.edgeActive.size() - 1].setFace(edgetoSplitSym->getFace());
4753 
4754  meshObj->mesh.edges[meshObj->mesh.edgeActive.size() - 2].setPrev(edgetoSplit);
4755  meshObj->mesh.edges[meshObj->mesh.edgeActive.size() - 2].setNext(e_next);
4756 
4757  if (edgetoSplit->getFace()) meshObj->mesh.edges[meshObj->mesh.edgeActive.size() - 2].setFace(edgetoSplit->getFace());
4758 
4759  // update verticesEdge map
4760  meshObj->mesh.addToVerticesEdge(edgetoSplitSym->getVertex()->getVertexId(), edgetoSplit->getVertex()->getVertexId(), edgetoSplit->getEdgeId());
4761 
4762  }
4763 
4764  if (fTriangulate)
4765  {
4766  for (int i = 0; i < eFaces.size(); i++) faceTriangulate( eFaces[i]);
4767  }
4768 
4769  return VertId;
4770  }

4786  void flipTriangleEdge(int &index)
4787  {
4788  if (index > meshObj->mesh.edgeActive.size()) throw std::invalid_argument(" error: index out of bounds.");
4789  if (!meshObj->mesh.edgeActive[index]) throw std::invalid_argument(" error: index out of bounds.");
4790 
4791  zEdge* edgetoFlip = &meshObj->mesh.edges[index];
4792  zEdge* edgetoFlipSym = edgetoFlip->getSym();
4793 
4794  if (!edgetoFlip->getFace() || !edgetoFlipSym->getFace())
4795  {
4796  throw std::invalid_argument("\n Cannot flip boundary edge %i ");
4797  return;
4798  }
4799 
4800  vector<int> edgetoFlip_fVerts;
4801  getVertices(edgetoFlip->getFace()->getFaceId(), zFaceData, edgetoFlip_fVerts);
4802 
4803  vector<int> edgetoFlipSym_fVerts;
4804  getVertices(edgetoFlipSym->getFace()->getFaceId(), zFaceData, edgetoFlipSym_fVerts);
4805 
4806  if (edgetoFlip_fVerts.size() != 3 || edgetoFlipSym_fVerts.size() != 3)
4807  {
4808  throw std::invalid_argument("\n Cannot flip edge not shared by two Triangles.");
4809  return;
4810  }
4811 
4812  zEdge* e_next = edgetoFlip->getNext();
4813  zEdge* e_prev = edgetoFlip->getPrev();
4814 
4815  zEdge* es_next = edgetoFlipSym->getNext();
4816  zEdge* es_prev = edgetoFlipSym->getPrev();
4817 
4818  // remove from verticesEdge map
4819  string removeHashKey = (to_string(edgetoFlip->getVertex()->getVertexId()) + "," + to_string(edgetoFlipSym->getVertex()->getVertexId()));
4820  meshObj->mesh.verticesEdge.erase(removeHashKey);
4821 
4822  string removeHashKey1 = (to_string(edgetoFlipSym->getVertex()->getVertexId()) + "," + to_string(edgetoFlip->getVertex()->getVertexId()));
4823  meshObj->mesh.verticesEdge.erase(removeHashKey1);
4824 
4825  // update pointers
4826 
4827  if (edgetoFlip->getVertex()->getEdge() == edgetoFlipSym)edgetoFlip->getVertex()->setEdge(edgetoFlipSym->getPrev()->getSym());
4828  if (edgetoFlipSym->getVertex()->getEdge() == edgetoFlip) edgetoFlipSym->getVertex()->setEdge(edgetoFlip->getPrev()->getSym());
4829 
4830  edgetoFlip->setVertex(e_next->getVertex());
4831  edgetoFlipSym->setVertex(es_next->getVertex());
4832 
4833 
4834 
4835  edgetoFlip->setNext(e_prev);
4836  edgetoFlip->setPrev(es_next);
4837 
4838  edgetoFlipSym->setNext(es_prev);
4839  edgetoFlipSym->setPrev(e_next);
4840 
4841  e_prev->setNext(es_next);
4842  es_prev->setNext(e_next);
4843 
4844  edgetoFlip->getNext()->setFace(edgetoFlip->getFace());
4845  edgetoFlip->getPrev()->setFace(edgetoFlip->getFace());
4846 
4847  edgetoFlipSym->getNext()->setFace(edgetoFlipSym->getFace());
4848  edgetoFlipSym->getPrev()->setFace(edgetoFlipSym->getFace());
4849 
4850  edgetoFlip->getFace()->setEdge(edgetoFlip);
4851  edgetoFlipSym->getFace()->setEdge(edgetoFlipSym);
4852 
4853  // update verticesEdge map
4854 
4855  string hashKey = (to_string(edgetoFlip->getVertex()->getVertexId()) + "," + to_string(edgetoFlipSym->getVertex()->getVertexId()));
4856  meshObj->mesh.verticesEdge[hashKey] = edgetoFlipSym->getEdgeId();
4857 
4858  string hashKey1 = (to_string(edgetoFlipSym->getVertex()->getVertexId()) + "," + to_string(edgetoFlip->getVertex()->getVertexId()));
4859  meshObj->mesh.verticesEdge[hashKey1] = edgetoFlip->getEdgeId();
4860  }

4869  void splitFaces(vector<int> &edgeList, vector<double> &edgeFactor)
4870  {
4871  if (edgeFactor.size() > 0)
4872  {
4873  if (edgeList.size() != edgeFactor.size()) throw std::invalid_argument(" error: size of edgelist and edge factor dont match.");
4874  }
4875 
4876  int numOriginalVertices = meshObj->mesh.vertexActive.size();
4877  int numOriginalEdges = meshObj->mesh.edgeActive.size();
4878  int numOriginalFaces = meshObj->mesh.faceActive.size();
4879 
4880  for (int i = 0; i < edgeList.size(); i++)
4881  {
4882  if (edgeFactor.size() > 0) splitEdge( edgeList[i], edgeFactor[i]);
4883  else splitEdge( edgeList[i]);
4884  }
4885 
4886  for (int j = 0; j < edgeList.size(); j++)
4887  {
4888  for (int i = 0; i < 2; i++)
4889  {
4890  zEdge *start = (i == 0) ? &meshObj->mesh.edges[edgeList[j]] : meshObj->mesh.edges[edgeList[j]].getSym();
4891 
4892  zEdge *e = start;
4893 
4894  if (!start->getFace()) continue;
4895 
4896  bool exit = false;
4897 
4898  int v1 = start->getVertex()->getVertexId();
4899  int v2 = start->getVertex()->getVertexId();
4900 
4901  do
4902  {
4903  if (e->getNext())
4904  {
4905  e = e->getNext();
4906  if (e->getVertex()->getVertexId() > numOriginalVertices)
4907  {
4908  v2 = e->getVertex()->getVertexId();
4909  exit = true;
4910  }
4911  }
4912  else exit = true;
4913 
4914  } while (e != start && !exit);
4915 
4916  // add new edges and face
4917  if (v1 == v2) continue;
4918 
4919  // check if edge exists continue loop.
4920  int outEdgeId;
4921  bool eExists = meshObj->mesh.edgeExists(v1, v2, outEdgeId);
4922 
4923  if (eExists) continue;
4924 
4925  int startEdgeId = start->getEdgeId();
4926  int e_EdgeId = e->getEdgeId();
4927 
4928  bool resizeEdges = meshObj->mesh.addEdges(v1, v2);
4929 
4930  if (resizeEdges)
4931  {
4932  start = &meshObj->mesh.edges[startEdgeId];
4933  e = &meshObj->mesh.edges[e_EdgeId];
4934  }
4935 
4936  meshObj->mesh.addPolygon(); // empty polygon
4937 
4938  // update pointers
4939  zEdge *start_next = start->getNext();
4940  zEdge *e_next = e->getNext();
4941 
4942  start->setNext(&meshObj->mesh.edges[numEdges() - 2]);
4943  e_next->setPrev(&meshObj->mesh.edges[numEdges() - 2]);
4944 
4945  start_next->setPrev(&meshObj->mesh.edges[numEdges() - 1]);
4946  e->setNext(&meshObj->mesh.edges[numEdges() - 1]);
4947 
4948  meshObj->mesh.faces[numPolygons() - 1].setEdge(start_next);
4949 
4950  // edge face pointers to new face
4951  zEdge *newFace_E = start_next;
4952 
4953  do
4954  {
4955  newFace_E->setFace(&meshObj->mesh.faces[numPolygons() - 1]);
4956 
4957  if (newFace_E->getNext()) newFace_E = newFace_E->getNext();
4958  else exit = true;
4959 
4960  } while (newFace_E != start_next && !exit);
4961 
4962  }
4963 
4964  }
4965 
4966 
4967  }

4974  void subdivideMesh(int numDivisions)
4975  {
4976  for (int j = 0; j < numDivisions; j++)
4977  {
4978 
4979  int numOriginalVertices = meshObj->mesh.vertexActive.size();
4980 
4981  // split edges at center
4982  int numOriginaledges = meshObj->mesh.edgeActive.size();
4983 
4984  for (int i = 0; i < numOriginaledges; i += 2)
4985  {
4986  if (meshObj->mesh.edgeActive[i]) splitEdge( i);
4987  }
4988 
4989 
4990  // get face centers
4991  vector<zVector> fCenters;
4992  getCenters( zFaceData, fCenters);
4993 
4994 
4995  // add faces
4996  int numOriginalfaces = meshObj->mesh.faceActive.size();
4997

4999  {
5000  if (!meshObj->mesh.faceActive[i]) continue;

5003  getEdges(i, zFaceData, fEdges);
5004 
5005  vector<int> fVerts;
5006  getVertices(i, zFaceData, fVerts);
5007 
5008 
5009  // disable current face
5010  meshObj->mesh.faceActive[i] = false;
5011 
5012  int numCurrentEdges = meshObj->mesh.edgeActive.size();;
5013 
5014  // check if vertex exists if not add new vertex
5015  int VertId;
5016  bool vExists = vertexExists(fCenters[i], VertId);
5017  if (!vExists)
5018  {
5019  meshObj->mesh.addVertex(fCenters[i]);
5020  VertId = meshObj->mesh.vertexActive.size() - 1;
5021  }
5022 
5023

5026  if (meshObj->mesh.edges[fEdges[0]].getVertex()->getVertexId() < numOriginalVertices) startId = 1;
5027

5034

5039  newFVerts.push_back(v3);

5042  newFVerts.push_back(v4);
5043 
5044  meshObj->mesh.addPolygon(newFVerts);
5045 
5046  }
5047 
5048  }

5051 
5052  }

5063  void smoothMesh( int numDivisions = 1, bool smoothCorner = false)
5064  {
5065  for (int j = 0; j < numDivisions; j++)
5066  {
5067 
5068 
5069  // get face centers
5070  vector<zVector> fCenters;
5071  getCenters( zFaceData, fCenters);
5072 
5073  // get edge centers
5074  vector<zVector> tempECenters;
5075  vector<zVector> eCenters;
5076  getCenters( zEdgeData, eCenters);
5077 
5078  tempECenters = eCenters;
5079 
5080  // compute new smooth positions of the edge centers
5081  for (int i = 0; i < eCenters.size(); i += 2)
5082  {
5083 
5084  zVector newPos;
5085 
5086  if (onBoundary(i, zEdgeData) || onBoundary(i + 1, zEdgeData)) continue;
5087 
5088  int eId = i;
5089 
5090  vector<int> eVerts;
5091  getVertices(i, zEdgeData, eVerts);
5092  for (int j = 0; j < eVerts.size(); j++) newPos += meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[eVerts[j]];
5093 
5094 
5095  vector<int> eFaces;
5096  getFaces(i, zEdgeData, eFaces);
5097  for (int j = 0; j < eFaces.size(); j++) newPos += fCenters[eFaces[j]];
5098 
5099  newPos /= (eFaces.size() + eVerts.size());
5100 
5101  eCenters[i] = newPos;
5102  eCenters[i + 1] = newPos;
5103 
5104  }
5105 
5106  // compute new smooth positions for the original vertices
5107  for (int i = 0; i < meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions.size(); i++)
5108  {
5109  if (onBoundary(i, zVertexData))
5110  {
5111  vector<int> cEdges;
5112  getConnectedEdges(i, zVertexData, cEdges);
5113 
5114  if (!smoothCorner && cEdges.size() == 2) continue;
5115 
5116  zVector P = meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[i];
5117  int n = 1;
5118 
5119  zVector R;
5120  for (int j = 0; j < cEdges.size(); j++)
5121  {
5122  int symEdge = meshObj->mesh.edges[cEdges[j]].getSym()->getEdgeId();
5123 
5124  if (onBoundary(cEdges[j], zEdgeData) || onBoundary(symEdge, zEdgeData))
5125  {
5126  R += tempECenters[cEdges[j]];
5127  n++;
5128  }
5129  }
5130 
5131  meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[i] = (P + R) / n;
5132 
5133  }
5134  else
5135  {
5136  zVector R;
5137  vector<int> cEdges;
5138  getConnectedEdges(i, zVertexData, cEdges);
5139  for (int j = 0; j < cEdges.size(); j++) R += tempECenters[cEdges[j]];
5140  R /= cEdges.size();
5141 
5142  zVector F;
5143  vector<int> cFaces;
5144  getConnectedFaces(i, zVertexData, cFaces);
5145  for (int j = 0; j < cFaces.size(); j++) F += fCenters[cFaces[j]];
5146  F /= cFaces.size();
5147 
5148  zVector P = meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[i];
5149  int n = cFaces.size();
5150 
5151  meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[i] = (F + (R * 2) + (P * (n - 3))) / n;
5152  }
5153 
5154 
5155  }
5156 
5157 
5158  int numOriginalVertices = meshObj->mesh.vertexActive.size();
5159 
5160  // split edges at center
5161  int numOriginaledges = meshObj->mesh.edgeActive.size();
5162 
5163  for (int i = 0; i < numOriginaledges; i += 2)
5164  {
5165  if (meshObj->mesh.edgeActive[i])
5166  {
5167  int newVert = splitEdge( i);
5168 
5169  meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[newVert] = eCenters[i];
5170  }
5171  }
5172 
5173 
5174 
5175  // add faces
5176  int numOriginalfaces = meshObj->mesh.faceActive.size();
5177 
5178  for (int i = 0; i < numOriginalfaces; i++)
5179  {
5180  if (!meshObj->mesh.faceActive[i]) continue;
5181 
5182  vector<int> fEdges;
5183  getEdges(i, zFaceData, fEdges);
5184 
5185  vector<int> fVerts;
5186  getVertices(i, zFaceData, fVerts);
5187 
5188 
5190 
5191  meshObj->mesh.faceActive[i] = false;
5192 
5193  int numCurrentEdges = meshObj->mesh.edgeActive.size();;
5194 
5195  // check if vertex exists if not add new vertex
5196  int VertId;
5197  bool vExists = vertexExists(fCenters[i], VertId);
5198  if (!vExists)
5199  {
5200  meshObj->mesh.addVertex(fCenters[i]);
5201  VertId = meshObj->mesh.vertexActive.size() - 1;
5202  }
5203 
5204 
5205  // add new faces
5206  int startId = 0;
5207  if (meshObj->mesh.edges[fEdges[0]].getVertex()->getVertexId() < numOriginalVertices) startId = 1;
5208 
5209  for (int k = startId; k < fEdges.size() + startId; k += 2)
5210  {
5211  vector<int> newFVerts;
5212 
5213  int v1 = meshObj->mesh.edges[fEdges[k]].getVertex()->getVertexId();
5214  newFVerts.push_back(v1);
5215 
5216  int v2 = VertId; // face center
5217  newFVerts.push_back(v2);
5218 
5219  int v3 = meshObj->mesh.edges[fEdges[k]].getPrev()->getSym()->getVertex()->getVertexId();
5220  newFVerts.push_back(v3);
5221 
5222  int v4 = meshObj->mesh.edges[fEdges[k]].getPrev()->getVertex()->getVertexId();
5223  newFVerts.push_back(v4);
5224 
5225  meshObj->mesh.addPolygon(newFVerts);
5226 
5227 
5228  }
5229 
5230 
5231 
5232  }
5233 
5234 
5235  //printMesh(inMesh);
5236 
5237  computeMeshNormals();
5238 
5239  }
5240 
5241 
5242 
5243 
5244  }
