5253  zObjMesh extrudeMesh(float extrudeThickness, bool thicknessTris = false)
5254  {
5255  if (meshObj->mesh.faceNormals.size() == 0 || meshObj->mesh.faceNormals.size() != meshObj->mesh.faceActive.size()) computeMeshNormals();
5256 
5257  zObjMesh out;
5258 
5259  vector<zVector> positions;
5260  vector<int> polyCounts;
5261  vector<int> polyConnects;
5262 
5263 
5264 
5265  for (int i = 0; i < meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions.size(); i++)
5266  {
5267  positions.push_back(meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[i]);
5268  }
5269 
5270  for (int i = 0; i < meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions.size(); i++)
5271  {
5272  positions.push_back(meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[i] + (meshObj->mesh.vertexNormals[i] * extrudeThickness));
5273  }
5274 
5275  for (int i = 0; i < numPolygons(); i++)
5276  {
5277  vector<int> fVerts;
5278  getVertices(i, zFaceData, fVerts);
5279 
5280  for (int j = 0; j < fVerts.size(); j++)
5281  {
5282  polyConnects.push_back(fVerts[j]);
5283  }
5284 
5285  polyCounts.push_back(fVerts.size());
5286 
5287  for (int j = fVerts.size() - 1; j >= 0; j--)
5288  {
5289  polyConnects.push_back(fVerts[j] + meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions.size());
5290  }
5291 
5292  polyCounts.push_back(fVerts.size());
5293 
5294  }
5295 
5296 
5297  for (int i = 0; i < numEdges(); i++)
5298  {
5299  if (onBoundary(i, zEdgeData))
5300  {
5301  vector<int> eVerts;
5302  getVertices(i, zEdgeData, eVerts);
5303 
5304  if (thicknessTris)
5305  {
5306  polyConnects.push_back(eVerts[1]);
5307  polyConnects.push_back(eVerts[0]);
5308  polyConnects.push_back(eVerts[0] + meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions.size());
5309 
5310  polyConnects.push_back(eVerts[0] + meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions.size());
5311  polyConnects.push_back(eVerts[1] + meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions.size());
5312  polyConnects.push_back(eVerts[1]);
5313 
5314  polyCounts.push_back(3);
5315  polyCounts.push_back(3);
5316  }
5317  else
5318  {
5319  polyConnects.push_back(eVerts[1]);
5320  polyConnects.push_back(eVerts[0]);
5321  polyConnects.push_back(eVerts[0] + meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions.size());
5322  polyConnects.push_back(eVerts[1] + meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions.size());
5323 
5324 
5325  polyCounts.push_back(4);
5326  }
5327 
5328 
5329  }
5330  }
5331 
5332  out.mesh = zMesh(positions, polyCounts, polyConnects);
5333 
5334  return out;
5335  }
5336 
5337 
5346  void offsetMeshFace(int faceIndex, double offset, vector<zVector>& offsetPositions)
5347  {
5348  vector<zVector> out;
5349 
5350  vector<int> fVerts;
5351  getVertices(faceIndex, zFaceData, fVerts);
5352 
5353  for (int j = 0; j < fVerts.size(); j++)
5354  {
5355  int next = (j + 1) % fVerts.size();
5356  int prev = (j - 1 + fVerts.size()) % fVerts.size();
5357 
5358 
5359  zVector Ori = meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[fVerts[j]];;
5360  zVector v1 = meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[fVerts[prev]] - meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[fVerts[j]];
5361  v1.normalize();
5362 
5363  zVector v2 = meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[fVerts[next]] - meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[fVerts[j]];
5364  v2.normalize();
5365 
5366  zVector v3 = v1;
5367 
5368  v1 = v1 ^ v2;
5369  v3 = v3 + v2;
5370 
5371  double cs = v3 * v2;
5372 
5373  zVector a1 = v2 * cs;
5374  zVector a2 = v3 - a1;
5375 
5376  double alpha = sqrt(a2.length() * a2.length());
5377  if (cs < 0) alpha *= -1;
5378 
5379  double length = offset / alpha;
5380 
5381  zVector mPos = meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[fVerts[j]];
5382  zVector offPos = mPos + (v3 * length);
5383 
5384  out.push_back(offPos);
5385 
5386  }
5387 
5388  offsetPositions = out;
5389 
5390  }
5391 
5402  void offsetMeshFace_Variable( int faceIndex, vector<double>& offsets, zVector& faceCenter, zVector& faceNormal, vector<zVector>& intersectionPositions)
5403  {
5404  vector<zVector> offsetPoints;
5405  vector<int> fEdges;
5406  getEdges(faceIndex, zFaceData, fEdges);
5407 
5408  for (int j = 0; j < fEdges.size(); j++)
5409  {
5410  zVector p2 = meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[meshObj->mesh.edges[fEdges[j]].getVertex()->getVertexId()];
5411  zVector p1 = meshObj->mesh.vertexPositions[meshObj->mesh.edges[fEdges[j]].getSym()->getVertex()->getVertexId()];
5412 
5413  zVector norm1 = ((p1 - p2) ^ faceNormal);
5414  norm1.normalize();
5415  if ((faceCenter - p1) * norm1 < 0) norm1 *= -1;
5416 
5417 
5418  offsetPoints.push_back(p1 + norm1 * offsets[j]);
5419  offsetPoints.push_back(p2 + norm1 * offsets[j]);
5420 
5421  }
5422 
5423 
5424  for (int j = 0; j < fEdges.size(); j++)
5425  {
5426  int prevId = (j - 1 + fEdges.size()) % fEdges.size();
5427 
5428  zVector a0 = offsetPoints[j * 2];
5429  zVector a1 = offsetPoints[j * 2 + 1];
5430 
5431  zVector b0 = offsetPoints[prevId * 2];
5432  zVector b1 = offsetPoints[prevId * 2 + 1];
5433 
5434 
5435 
5436  double uA = -1;
5437  double uB = -1;
5438  bool intersect = meshObj->mesh.coreUtils.line_lineClosestPoints(a0, a1, b0, b1, uA, uB);
5439 
5440  if (intersect)
5441  {
5442  //printf("\n %i working!! ", j);
5443 
5444  zVector closestPt;
5445 
5446  if (uA >= uB)
5447  {
5448  zVector dir = a1 - a0;
5449  double len = dir.length();
5450  dir.normalize();
5451 
5452  if (uA < 0) dir *= -1;
5453  closestPt = a0 + dir * len * uA;
5454  }
5455  else
5456  {
5457  zVector dir = b1 - b0;
5458  double len = dir.length();
5459  dir.normalize();
5460 
5461  if (uB < 0) dir *= -1;
5462 
5463  closestPt = b0 + dir * len * uB;
5464  }
5465 
5466 
5467  intersectionPositions.push_back(closestPt);
5468  }
5469 
5470  }
5471  }
5472 
5473 
5474 
5475  };
5476 
5477 
5478 
5479 }
